GSP33nysu__2u:6: siddhaye prathamādhyāyārthasaṅgatatvena dvitīyādhyāyārthaṃ vivakṣurabuddhisthena saṅgaterdarśayitumaśakyatvāt prathamādhyāyārthaṃ tāvadanuvadati- ukta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10: jagajjanmādinimittakāraṇe sārvajjñasarvaiśvaryādyanantaguṇaparipūrṇe 'vidyādyavadyagandhavidhure pare brahmaṇi nārāyaṇe svaravarṇapadavākyamahāvākyarūpasya samastasya śāstrasya,
GSP33nysu__2u:12: tathā mahātātparyeṇa natu pārārthyena samanvayaḥ prathame 'dhyāye samarthita ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:16: paramamukhyayā tu vṛttyā anvayaṃ darśayituṃ sākṣādityuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:17: yadvā na pradhānaparamāṇvādinirāsanena upādānatvādipratipādanena ca paramparayā kintu sākṣādevetyanenācaṣṭe /
GSP33nysu__2u:19: evaṃ prathamādhyāyārthamabhidhāya tatsaṅgatatvena dvitīyādhyāyārthamāha- avirodha iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:22: atrokte 'rthe 'virodho virodhābhāvo 'tra vyācikhyāsitatayā buddhisannihite dvitīye('dhyāye) sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:24: sakalaśāstrasya samanvayena jagajjanmādikāraṇatve samastagurapūrṇatve 'śeṣadoṣavidhuratve ca parasya brahmaṇo 'bhihita eva(hi)
GSP33nysu__2u:30: athavā śrutisamanvayenopapādito 'pyartho na tāvacchrotṝṇāṃ dṛḍhanirūḍho bhavati,
GSP33nysu__2u:57: tasya caturvidhasyāpi virodhābhāvasya madhye yuktivirodhābhāvaḥ prathamapāde sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:58: sarveṣāmapi virodhānāṃ yuktyupajīvitavena tadvirodhasya prabalatayā tadabhāvasādhanasya prāthamyopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:59: yuktipuraskāreṇa yuktyupajīvitvena tadvirodhasya prabalatayā tadabhāvasādhanasya prāthamyopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:69: tathāca virodhasya yuktyādyupadhānena caturvidhatvāttadabhāvasādhanena pādabhedo yujyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:70: caturvidhasya tasya virodhasya madhye yaukto virodha ādāvuktaprakāreṇa prabalo yatastasmāttadabhāvo 'trādau sādhyata iti yojanīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:76: caturvidhasyāpi tasya virodhino madhye yukteḥ prabalatvādādau yaukto yuktisambandhī virodhābhāvaḥ sādhyata iti yojyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:86: yadyapi smṛterityasya na nañarthena sambandho ghaṭate virodhaśca samāse guṇabhūtaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:87: tathāpi buddhayā viviktena tena sambandhaḥ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:90: kartavyatāyāṃ vā prāthamyaṃ kuta ityata āha- tasyā iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:95: pāśupatādismṛtayo hi svayamāptābhimatavākyatayā samayarūpā api svābhimatārthe yuktīḥ śrutīśca saṃvādayantyo yuktisamayādivirodhicatuṣyayarūpāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:99: prathamātikrame ca kāraṇaṃ na kiñcidastītyādyādhikaraṇe nirūpyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:100: evañca tatrāpi ca smṛterityayamuktasyāpavādo bhavannapi na sarvathetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:104: prasaṅgacchiṣyāṇāṃ śāstre bahumānotpādanāyānyadapi cāturvidhyaṃ vakti- pratyekamiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:108: catvāro 'pi pādāḥ pratyekaṃ caturātmakāḥ pādacatuṣyayārthavanto draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:116: na kevalamevaṃ pādāḥ, kintu tadaṃśāśca te pādā aṃśā yeṣāṃ te tadaṃśā adhyāyā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:121: yadā prathamaḥ samanvayasyārtho vivakṣyate na tadā tadarthatetareṣāmityādi /
GSP33nysu__2u:127: catasṛṇāṃ vāsudevādimūrtīnāṃ pratipādakatvenāpi caturātmakatvaṃ jñātavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:128: nanvetaduktameva, punaḥ kasmāducyata ityata āha- varṇamiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:134: na kevalaṃ pratyakṣaraṃ pratipadaṃ pratisūtraṃ pratyadhikaraṇaṃ kintvetacchāstragatamekaṃ varṇamārabhya ā sarvaśāstrāt,
GSP33nysu__2u:135: pratyadhikaraṇaṃ pratipādaṃ pratyādhyāyaṃ samastena śāstreṇa ca catasro mūrtayaḥ pratipādyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:143: etā eva tvatibalā siddhāntasya niyāmakāḥ // MAnuv_2,1.4 //
GSP33nysu__2u:145: uktārthaṃ smṛtivirodhenākṣipya samādadhatsūtram oṃ smṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅga iti cennānyasmṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅgāt oṃ //
GSP33nysu__2u:148: yaduktaṃ parasya brahmaṇo viṣṇoḥ sakalajagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ sārvajñyādisakalaguṇapūrṇatvaṃ samastadoṣadūratvaṃ ca tadayuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:151: naca tāsāmanyo 'vakāśo 'sti yena pratīte 'pyarthe tātparyābhāvaṃ pratīmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:161: śrutisamanvayanyāyena pāśupatādismṛtīnāmapi parabrahmaṇi samanvayena śivārcanādiparatvena vā sāvakāśatvācca /
GSP33nysu__2u:169: sāmyāpādanamātre 'pi parasyaiva jayo niścayapratibandhakatvādityato nirdalaṃ pūrvapakṣa tāvadujjīvayati- āptairiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:172: āptaiḥ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭvā proktamarthaṃ kathaṃ śratiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:173: pipīlikālipinibhā vārayeta sarvagā hi te // MAnuv_2,1.5 //
GSP33nysu__2u:199: śrutimūlatayābhimatā hi tāḥ smṛtayo 'tastāsāṃ mūlaśrutyanumāpakatvena prāmāṇyamiṣyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:201: yathā'ha jaiminiḥ“virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānam'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:219: kintu sahajasiddhena yogardhilabdhena vā pratyakṣeṇāśeṣārthadarśināmāptānāṃ vacanamanusṛtya netavyāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:224: tadidamuktaṃ pipīlikālipinibhā saṃvādena vinā kamapyarthaṃ pratipādayitumasamarthā śrutiryadvacanasaṃvādāpekṣiṇī tairevāptaiḥ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭvā proktamarthaṃ kathaṃ vārayet /
GSP33nysu__2u:230: tadeva kuta ityata āha- sarvagā hīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:241: tathāca teṣāṃ mohābhāvena rāgadveṣayorapyabhāvāt vipralipsā ca nivartate /
GSP33nysu__2u:245: icchāpi pratipipādayiṣā vā vipralipsā veti sandeho 'vaśiṣyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:246_0: tatrābhyāsadaśāpanno 'yamartho 'syeti sāmānyato niścaye bhavatyeva tasya jñānasya
GSP33nysu__2u:247: vipralipsā ca hetudarśanena vyāptā hetau sati syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:250: na tāvatpāntheṣu vimārgeṇa pratiṣṭhamāneṣu mleñchānāṃ kaścitsvopakāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:259: anabhyāsadaśāpanne tu viṣaye pramāṇāntarasaṃvādātpravṛttisāmarthyādvā mohavipralipsayornivṛttirityato mleñchā apyāptā bhavanti /
GSP33nysu__2u:274: nanu viruddhayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ sāmye sati satpratipakṣatā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:285: ... mānaṃ hy ubhayatra samaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,1.6cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:288: yasmādevaṃ tasmādubhayatra pūrvapakṣasiddhāntayormānaṃ smṛtidvayaṃ samaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:289: tathā ca pāśupatādismṛtīnāṃ satpratipakṣatvaṃ sthitamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:290: nanu ye viruddhe pramāṇe na tayoḥ sāmyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:297: ubhayatra dvayossmaraṇayormadhye yatsamaṃ saha mayā mūlapramāṇena vartate,
GSP33nysu__2u:305: tathobhayatra smaraṇe yatpañcarātrādismaraṇaṃ samaṃ samūlapramāṇaṃ saṃvādipamāṇāntaropetaṃ ca,
GSP33nysu__2u:306: tadeva mānaṃ bhavenna tu pāśupatādikam, mūlādyabhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:311: yāvatā paśupatiprabhṛtīnāmāptistatra mūlamuditetyata āha- na ceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:326: athocyeta sarvajñānāṃ mohābhāvāttanmūlayo rāgadveṣayorabhāve vipralipsāpi nivartata ityāptiniścaya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:327: kiṃ tatra sarve 'pi tīrthakarā āptā ityaṅgīkṛtyaivamanumīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:339: naca tatra sāvarjñyaṃ nāṅgīkriyata iti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:347: niścīyatāṃ jñānam, tasya yāthārthyaṃ tu kutaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:348: abhyāsadaśāpanno 'yam artho 'syeti sāmānyaniścaye sati tatsiddhiriti netyāha- vyabhicārata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:353: tāsu tāsu smṛtiṣvabhiniviṣyāḥ sarve 'pi hi taṃ tamācāryaṃ tatra tatrārthe 'bhyāsavantamevācakṣate /
GSP33nysu__2u:354: naca tadīyaṃ jñānaṃ yathārthamevāṅgīkartuṃ śakyaṃ, tvatsiddhāntavirodhitvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:360: asya niyamasya buddhādiṣu bhagnatvādityāha- vyabhicarata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:362: yasya kasyāpi vipralambhakatve, hetudarśanābhāvasya tatraiva vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:363: nahi tattatpuruṣaviśeṣānusaṃhitāste te prayojanaviśeṣāḥ piśitanayanairasmadādibhiravadhārayituṃ śakyanta ityāśayenāha- vyabhicārata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:373: atha viśvahitopadeśārthaṃ pravṛttyā vipralambhābhāvo 'numīyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:375: atha te na tathā, kintvayogyajanavyāmohanārthamiti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:384: yato nivārayiṣyāmastava(vacana)camatkāraṃ mā tvariṣṭhā ityāśayenāha- vyabhicārata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:385: athāgamaḥ sa kiṃ vedādiruta tadviruddhaṃ smṛtyantaramathavā svayūthyaracitaṃ granthāntaram /
GSP33nysu__2u:405: tasya bauddhādiviṣaye 'pi vidyamānatvena vyabhicārādityāha- vyabhicārata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:417: na hyekatrāptena sarvatrāpi tathā bhāvyamiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33nysu__2u:423: kiñca phalavyabhicāratastadaṃśasyānāptimūlatvasthitau paśupatipraṇītatvādestatra vyabhicārataḥ kathamanumānaṃ syādityāha- vyabhicārata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:426: tadanena“itareṣāṃ cānupalabdheḥ, etena yogaḥ pratyuktaḥ'; iti sūtradvayaṃ vyākhyātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:434: nacāsyā vyabhicāre 'pi hīyate mānatā kvacit // MAnuv_2,1.7cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:440: yataḥ phalavyabhicāre hetau kvacid dṛṣṭārthāyāṃ vartamāne asyā adṛṣṭārthāyāṃ phalavyabhicāre,
GSP33nysu__2u:441: tata evāprāmāṇye satyapyasyā adṛṣṭārthāyāstāvavanmānatā na hīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:446: atha dṛṣṭārthāyāḥ phalavyabhicāreṇāprāmāṇye sati tata evādṛṣṭārthā apyapramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:447: tata iti kiṃ tena hetunota tena dṛṣṭāntena /
GSP33nysu__2u:449: kvacidvayabhicāre(ṇā)'prāmāṇye 'pyasyā mānatā hīyata iti na yuktam, vyāptyabhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:451: kvacidvayabhicāre 'prāmāṇye('pi) asyā mānatā hīyata ityetanna yuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:455: dṛṣṭārthāyāṃ phalavyabhicāre aprāmāṇye ca satyasyā api mānatā śaṅkāspadatvena hīyata iti ca na vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:460: nirdoṣavākyaṃ vedaḥ tadyuktiḥ samarthapravṛttijanakatvaṃ prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇasya yata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:463: tata evetarasyā apyaprāmāṇyaśaṅkanaṃ ca svātantryeṇa kriyate kiṃvā pratibandīgrahaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:468: pareṇa khalu phalasaṃvādādinā pāśupatādismṛterāptimūlatvaprāmāṇyayoranumitayorasmābhistannyāyena phalavisaṃvādaṃ pradarśya doṣo 'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:472: na caivaṃ tatprāmāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ nirmūlaṃ syāditi vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:477: nanu śrutereva vaktṛguṇahīnāyā na prāmāṇyamityato nirdoṣavākyetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:478: bodhakatvenaiva hi prāmāṇyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ tacca vākyatvācchaterubhayasammatam /
GSP33nysu__2u:480: na cāpauruṣeye sa sambhavatīti niṣkampameva śrutiprāmāṇyamiti vakṣyāma ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:483: iti tattathā kintvaviruddhānāmevopāyatvaṃ na tu viruddhānām /
GSP33nysu__2u:487: nanu ca pañcarātrādismṛtīnāṃ prāmāṇyamaṅgīkurvāṇaiḥ sarvathā pravṛttisāmarthyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:489: anyathā phalavyabhicāri ca pramāṇaṃ ceti vyāghātāpātāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:491: naca tadyuktimūlateti suhṛdbhāvena pṛcchantaṃ pratyāha- vedoktasyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:493: niyamo vyabhicāro vā naiva jñātuṃ hi śakyate // MAnuv_2,1.8 //
GSP33nysu__2u:495: vaidikagranthopadiṣyānuṣṭhāne vedoktā niṣekādisaṃskārā evādhikāratāmāpadyanta iti vedoktasyetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:500: sadeti svabhāvata eva na tu deśādivyavadhānenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:519: prakṛte cobhayakulaśuddhivaidikaniṣekādisaṃskārādyadhikārapūrvakaṃ viśuddhābhisandhyādimatā samyaganuṣṭhita karma asati pratibandhake,
GSP33nysu__2u:522: tathā ca yatra phalaṃ nopalabdhaṃ tatrādhikārādivaiguṇyamitaratra tu tatsādguṇyamityato niyamaniścaya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:529: tathācāsya phalaniyama eva vyabhicārastu vaiguṇyanimitta iti vāstu /
GSP33nysu__2u:531: kvacitphalopalambhastu kākatālīyo 'nyanimitta eveti vā bhavatviti sandeho na nivartate /
GSP33nysu__2u:534: vedasaṃvādena tu prāmāṇye 'vadhārite śakyate phalavyabhicārasyānyā gatiḥ kalpayitum /
GSP33nysu__2u:535: ato vedasaṃvādenaiva prāmāṇyaṃ pañcarātrādīnāmavadhāryate na pravṛttisāmarthyeneti /
GSP33nysu__2u:539: yathā ca pañcarātrādiprāmāṇyamabhilaṣatā phalavyabhicārasyādhikārādivaikalyanibandhanatā kalpyā tathāhamapi pāśupatādismṛtiṣu kalpayiṣyāmīti,
GSP33nysu__2u:542: vedokto hy adhikārastu durlabhaḥ sarvamānuṣaiḥ // MAnuv_2,1.9 //
GSP33nysu__2u:552: nanu kathamanyāgameṣvadhikāraḥ sādhanaṃ ca sulabhamuktamityato leśena daśaryati- anyāgameṣviti //
GSP33nysu__2u:556: yadbhāvāḥ tareṇa mahatā tapasā vinā vā(na)'labhyaṃ tadapītyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:559: viprā eva ye kamarṇā caṇḍālāsteṣāṃ kathañcitpratyāpattirvaidikairapyaṅgīkriyata ityataścaṇḍālajanmanāmityuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:565: caramamaṇḍalapraveśe tu vipraḥ sampadyata ityanyāgameṣu pratipādyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:575: karṇikā rucakaṃ caiva kuṇḍalaṃ ca śikhāmaṇiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:577: ābhirmudritadehastu na bhūya iha jāyate (kāyabhāk)'; ityādi /
GSP33nysu__2u:579: rudrākṣakaṅkaṇaṃ haste jaṭā caikā ca mastake /
GSP33nysu__2u:580: kapālaṃ bhasmanā snānaṃ lakuṭaṃ (ca kalā) kalaśārcanam'; ityādi /
GSP33nysu__2u:582: nanu yathādhikārasādhanayoḥ saulabhyamuktamevaṃ taddaurlabhyamapi tatraivoktamiti cettarhi na kevalaṃ phalasaṃvādena pāśupatādīnāmaprāmāṇyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:587: ucyate 'tastaduktaṃ hi vyabhicāri phale 'pi tu // MAnuv_2,1.11 //
GSP33nysu__2u:593: yasmācca taduktaṃ sādhanaṃ phale 'pi viṣaye vyabhicāri atastaduktaṃ sā pāśupatādyuktiḥ kathaṃ pramāṇatāṃ gacchenna kathamapītyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:595: tathāca phalavisaṃvādo 'pyadhikārādivaiguṇyanimitto bhaviṣyati yathā pañcarātrādāviti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:600: kvacitsaṃvādastu kākatālīyo vā guḍajihvikānimitto vā bhaviṣyati /
GSP33nysu__2u:603: tadevaṃ pāśupatādīnāmapasmṛtitvānna tadvirodhenoktārthāsambhavaḥ śaṅkanīya iti sthitam /
GSP33nysu__2u:609: // oṃ na vilakṣaṇatvādasya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt oṃ //
GSP33nysu__2u:626: dṛśī daśā tadā kā vātasmṛtītihāsapurāṇānāṃ phalavyabhicārādi(doṣa)
GSP33nysu__2u:628: tathāca vedādisamanvayena na jagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ siddhayatītyevaṃ prāpte tatpratividhānātharsya na vilakṣaṇatvāditi sūtrasya tātparyamāha- nityatvāditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:629: na vilakṣaṇatvād asya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt | BBs_2,1.4 |
GSP33nysu__2u:631: ujkhitaṃ sarvadoṣaiśca kathaṃ no mānatāṃ vrajet // MAnuv_2,1.12c-d //
GSP33nysu__2u:635: bodhakatvena khalu karaṇānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ doṣāttu, kadācidapanīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:638: vākye ca prāmāṇyasyāpavādakā doṣā abodhakatvaviparītabodhakatvādayaḥsarve 'pi vaktṛdoṣanibandhanā eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:640: vedavākyaṃ ca nityatvādapauruṣeyatvātpuruṣadoṣanibandhanaiḥ sarvadoṣairvarjitaṃ svata eva prāmāṇyamāpnoti /
GSP33nysu__2u:641: prāmāṇye ca niścite sati phalavyabhicārasya sāmagrīvaikalyaṃ vā pratibandhakasadbhāvo vā kāraṇaṃ kalpayiṣyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:653: ye tu svayūthyā vedaprāmāṇyamaṅgīkṛtyāpi tannityatāṃ nānumanyante tānprati sūtrasūcitābhiḥ śrutibhistāmupapādayati- virūpeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:660: tadapi bahukālīnatvaṃ bhaviṣyatītyato“nityayānityayā staumi brahma tatparamaṃ padam';
GSP33nysu__2u:661: iti“śrutirvāva nityānityā vāva smṛtayo yāścanyā vācaḥ';
GSP33nysu__2u:669: vākyaśeṣe hi bahukālīnā api smṛtīranityapakṣe nikṣipya śrutimeva nityāmāha /
GSP33nysu__2u:671: āptoktatvasya duravadhāraṇatāyāḥ prāguktatvena pauruṣeyatve prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇānupapattiprasaṅgena durbalatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:672: prāmāṇyasya svatastvenāpauruṣeyatve 'pi kāraṇābhāvātprāmāṇyaṃ na syāditi prasaṅgasyābhāsatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:674: tathāca“ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire'“ṛgveda evāgnerajayata'; ityādyupapannaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:685: aprāmāṇyaṃ khalu pipīlikāliperabodhakatvena vā syādviparītabodhakatvena vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:701: tacca lekhakabuddhisthaśabdaviṣayaṃ vā tadavabuddhārthaviṣayaṃ vā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:708: kiñcetaratrāpyanumāne kimeḍamūkavyāvṛttyarthaṃ kimapi viśeṣaṇamupādeyamuta neti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:715: atha mūlalekhakabuddhisthaśabdārthānumāne na ko 'pi doṣa iti matam /
GSP33nysu__2u:719: nahi pipīlikālipeḥ puruṣaliperasti kaścidviśeṣo yena neyaṃ pipīlikālipiriti niścinuyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:728: lipidarśanādikaṃ tu saṃskāro dvedhābhidhasahakārisampādanenaiva caritārthamiti kathaṃ tasya prāmāṇyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:732: tathāca cakṣuṣa ivārthopasarpaṇatatsaṃyogasahitasya prāmāṇyamevaṃ lipidarśanatadudbuddhasaṃskārasahitasyaiva manasa iti kathaṃ na lipeḥ prāmāṇyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:735: nanvatra pramāṇaśabdo bhāvasādhano vā syātkāraṇasādhano vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:736: ādye pipīlikālipiḥ pramāṇamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:745: nanu ca śruteḥ samyaganubhavasādhanatvena prāmāṇyamiṣyaṃ natu smārakatvena /
GSP33nysu__2u:746: tathāca na śrutiḥ samyaganubhavasādhanabuddhipūrvakatvātpipīlikālipivadityanumāsyata ityata āha- yatheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:750: yathābuddhipūrvakamapyekenolūkena kṛtamanekakākanāśanamaśvatthāmno 'hameka evānekānvadhiṣyāmītyasyārthasya bodhakaṃ samyaganubhavaṃ prati sādhanaṃ jātam /
GSP33nysu__2u:754: sāditve 'pi buddhijanyatvābhāvo vā pratipādyātharbuddhipūrvakatvābhāvo vānenaitadevaṃ pratipādayiṣyāmītyabhisandhipūrvakatāvaidhuryaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:765: anumānamātre suvaco 'pi cetanavyāpāraviṣayasya tathābhūta eva śākune pradarśayitumucita iti na pradarśitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:768: yattu pramāṇāviruddhaṃ tadvayabhicārasthalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti bhāvenoktam- aviruddhamiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:772: vibhaktipratirūpakaṃ cāvyayaṃ bhavatīti vacanādavyayametaditi na doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:783: na conmattavākyamapi pramāṇaṃ pramāṇaviruddhatvādityata āha- viruddhaṃ tviti //
GSP33nysu__2u:786: pramāṇaviruddhaṃ yadunmattavākyaṃ tat pramāṇavirodhādeva bādhitamayathārthamiti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:803: nanvasyopādheryadayathārthaṃ tatpramāṇaviruddhamiti sādhyavyāpakatve 'pi sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ kathamityata āha- virodheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:819: yadvā vedo yathārtho bodhakatve sati pramāṇāviruddhatvātpratyakṣavat /
GSP33nysu__2u:822: evaṃ vākyatvāvacchinne sādhye 'nāptapraṇītatvamupādhistadviparyayeṇa ca pratipakṣo 'bhidheya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:827: yena prāmāṇyamavadhārya phalavyabhicāramanyathā neṣyāma ityata āha- tanmūlatvāditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:831: yadyapi bhagavadracitānāṃ vedā(dar)thamupalabhya racitatvaṃ vedamūlatvaṃ nāsti /
GSP33nysu__2u:833: tathāpi tamanusṛtya racitatvaṃ tanmūlatvamiha vivakṣitamiti noktadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:841: sati caivaṃ smṛtīnāṃ prāmāṇye tadbalena phalavyabhicāro 'pyanyathayitavya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:843: teṣāṃ prāmāṇyasādhane ca bahuviplavaḥ syādityata āha- virodha iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:847: yāsāṃ smṛtīnāṃ sarvathā pramāṇavirodho nāsti tāsāmeva pakṣīkaraṇānna kaściddoṣa ityāśayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:852: vedamūlatvena tu prāmāṇye siddhe na ko 'pi doṣa iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:859: virodho 'pi sa evoktaḥ pratyakṣeṇāgamena vā // MAnuv_2,1.16cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:864: virodhādeva bādhitamityaprāmāṇyaprayojakatayokto virodho 'pi sa eva yaḥ pratyakṣeṇāgamena vā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:867: aprāmāṇyaprayojakatayā yadasmābhirabhihitaṃ tatpakṣe 'pyupapādayituṃ khalu parasyāyaṃ prayatnaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:871: nanu pramāṇavirodha evāprāmāṇye prayojako 'stu kiṃ pratyakṣeṇāgamena veti viśeṣaṇena /
GSP33nysu__2u:874: vakṣyāmo hyatra brahmādivastuṣu pramāṇaṃ veda evaika iti vaidike 'rthe 'numānasyānavakāśam /
GSP33nysu__2u:875: yatra ca yasyāpraveśo na tasya tadbādhakam /
GSP33nysu__2u:877: tathāca kathamanumānaṃ vedā(dyar)thabādhakena tadaprāmāṇye prayojakaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:881: tarhi vedārthamīmāṃsā nārambhaṇīyā syāt mīmāṃsāyā yuktyanusandhānātmakatavādityata āha- āgameneti //
GSP33nysu__2u:888: naca dharmyādirūpaṃ brahmādikaṃ vedādṛte siddhayatīti tadanapekṣāyāmāśrayāsiddhayādikam,
GSP33nysu__2u:889: apekṣāyāṃ tu virodhino dharmyādigrāhakavirodha ityevaṃ vaidike 'rthe 'numānasyānavakāśo 'bhidhistitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:890: mīmāṃsāyāṃ tu kvacidāgamasyāgamāntareṇa virodha evārthanirṇayārthaṃ yuktirupādīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:897: api ca pratyakṣāgamavirodho 'pi na svarūpeṇāprāmāṇyaṃ prayojayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:898: kintu tayorupajīvyatvādinā prābalye satyeva durbalayoḥ svayaṃ bādhitatvena samabalayoḥ pratibandhamātrahetutvenāprāmāṇyaniścayānupapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:911: ataśca na tadvirodhena vedasyāprāmāṇyaṃ mantavyamityāśayenāha- pratyakṣamiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:921: ityādivedaṃ prati niraniṣyo niravadya ityādestasya vedo(dasyo)pajīvyatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:922: evaṃ niravakāśatvādikamapi pratyakṣāgamayoreva prāyeṇa sambhavati yuktestu kvacideva /
GSP33nysu__2u:928: nahi sarvatrāgamayoḥ parasparavirodha eva mīmāṃsāvatāryata ityata āha- yukta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:934: tathāpi yatra naivaṃ tatraikasyaivāgamasyānekārthapratītau yuktyanusāriṇamarthamupādāya tadanuguṇatadviruddhārthaparityāgaḥ kriyata iti noktaniyamabhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:944: yadvā yatsiddhavatkṛtya tatra mīmāṃsārambhānupapattiḥ parihṛtā tadidānīṃ darśayitumāha- yuktiśceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:947: vyāptiḥ pratyakṣatā yasyā yuktigā'gamagā tathā // MAnuv_2,1.20ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:949: yasyā yukteḥ sādhyena vyāptiḥ pratyakṣagā pratyakṣāvagatā saikā /
GSP33nysu__2u:950: yuktigā yuktyavagatā yasyā vyāptiḥ sā dvitīyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:951: tathā'gamagā āgamāvagatā yasyā vyāptiḥ sā tṛtīyeti /
GSP33nysu__2u:957: evaṃ tarhi yā yuktimūlā yuktiḥ sā nāgamādyupajīvinīti tasya bādhikā /
GSP33nysu__2u:967: tathāca pratyakṣādyapekṣatvena sāmye 'pi bahusaṃvidhānānapekṣayoḥ pratyakṣāgamamūlayoryuktyoḥ prabalatvaṃ tadapekṣāyāstu yuktimūlāyā durbalatvaṃ yuktameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:968: tathāca prabalayor(yuktyor)yadedṛśī daśā tadā kā (vārtā) durbalāyā yukterāgamabādhanādāviti /
GSP33nysu__2u:979: ata eva pramāṇalakṣaṇādau nirūpitasyārthasya punaratra nirūpaṇaṃ na doṣāya /
GSP33nysu__2u:985: vasara ityataḥ pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ prathamaṃ tāvadāha- yāthārthyameveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:999: kiṃ sajātīyeti pramāṇatvena (sajātīyatvaṃ) vivakṣitaṃ rūpāntareṇa vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:1010: evaṃ tarhi lakṣyāpekṣayā bhinnādvayavaccheda ityevocyatāṃ kṛtaṃ jñānatvādinā sājātyena prakṛtānupayoginā varṇitena /
GSP33nysu__2u:1011: yadā ca lakṣyādanyatva pareṣāmavagataṃ tadā parebhyo 'nyatvamapi lakṣyasyārthādavagamyata iti siddhamagrato lakṣaṇaprayojanamiti vaiyarthyameva syāllakṣaṇākhyānasya /
GSP33nysu__2u:1013: api ca na tāvadanena lakṣaṇenānavagatenaiva vyavacchinnapratītisambhavaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1019: nāpi kāryeṇa liṅgena tadanupapattyā vā tadavagamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1028: prathamabhāvitayāvaśyābhyupeyatayā laghorupāyātsādhyasiddhau sambhavatyāṃ caramabhāvitayā avaśyānuṣṭheyatvābhāvena gurāvupāye pravartamānasya tavaivedaṃ (dūṣaro)doṣodbhāvanam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1029: pradīpe pradīpaṃ prajvālya tamonirāsāya yatamānasyaiva puṃsaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1043: yatra liṅgamavyāpakatvānnāsti tatra lakṣaṇasya pramāṇābhāvātpratyetumaśakyatvena kathaṃ tataḥ prāmāṇyādyavagamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1047: atha yatra tallakṣaṇe liṅgaṃ nāsti tatra liṅgāntarātpratyetavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1052: lakṣyānumānasya lakṣaṇaprayojanasyobhābhyāmeva siddheḥ kṛtaṃ vyāpakena tena /
GSP33nysu__2u:1068: sāsnādimāngauriti viditalakṣaṇasambandho hi yaṃ piṇḍaṃ sāsnādimantaṃ paśyati taṃ nāyamaśvādirnāpi ghaṭādiriti pratipādyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1072: atha lakṣyapratītinirapekṣameva lakṣaṇena vyavacchedo bodhyata iti matam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1077: asaṅkīrṇatayā gopiṇḍaṃ paśyannapi hi na tāvadayaṃ nāśvo na ghaṭa iti pratyeti yāvallakṣaṇaṃ nāvagacchati /
GSP33nysu__2u:1087: yathā yathārthajñānatatsādhanasya pramāṇasya jñānaṃ tatsādhanaṃ ca sajātīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1089: yathā ca pratyakṣasyānumānādikaṃ sajātīyaṃ, vijātīyaṃ tu ghaṭādikam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1091: evaṃ tarhi lakṣyāpekṣayā bhinnādvayavaccheda ityuktaṃ syāditi cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1093: nahi ko 'pi svasthātmā svasmādeva vyavacchedaṃ lakṣaṇaprayojanamācakṣati(ṣye) /
GSP33nysu__2u:1097: vastuto yallakṣyādbhinnaṃ tato vyavacchedāvagamārthatvāllakṣaṇasya pratipādakasya yadyapi lakṣyānyatvajñānamalakṣye(vaśyā)
GSP33nysu__2u:1101: jñānaṃ vinā lakṣyasya alakṣyānyatvajñānaṃ lakṣaṇaprayojanaṃ na siddhayatīti kaścit /
GSP33nysu__2u:1111: yatra liṅgāttadavagamastatra tata eva lakṣaṇaprayojanasiddhervyarthā parasparākusṛṣṭiriti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:1139: tatrādyaṃ lakṣyasvarūpapratipattikāraṇaṃ bhavat tasyānvayo vyavacchedatacchabdavyavahartavyate ca pratipādayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:1157: yastu kāṣṭhaloṣṭhayitaḥ kañcitpadārthaṃ vā kasyacitkiñcicchabdavācyatvaṃ vā na vetti nāsau lakṣaṇaśāstre'dhikriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1171: antye kimidaṃ tvadabhidhānamāptopadeśatayā lakṣaṇaṃ bodhayatyuta liṅgādibhāvena /
GSP33nysu__2u:1180: sa hi sarvasya śāstrasya kartāramāptameva manyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1183: yadi na prativādinaṃ prati śāstraṃ kintu śiṣyaṃ prati tadā pratijñāmātrādevāptavacanācchiṣyasyārthaniścayopapatterhetvādyabhidhānamanarthakatāmāpannaṃ śāstre /
GSP33nysu__2u:1186: lakṣaṇavākyaṃ tu śiṣyameva prati prayojakaṃ pratipannaśāstrakārāptabhāvamiti manyase /
GSP33nysu__2u:1189: asti hi samayagrāhakaṃ śāstraṃ munibhiḥ praṇītaṃ nāmaliṅgānuśāsanavyākaraṇādīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1194: naca yathārthaṃ pramāṇamiti sāsnādimāngauriti vākyasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyamabhyupagacchāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1200: ayaṃ gaurityādyupadeśādinaikasyāṃ vyaktau gośabdārthatayāvagatāyāṃ kimiyameva vyaktiḥ (evam)
GSP33nysu__2u:1201: utānyāpīti jijñāsamānaṃ pratyanyatrāpi gośabdārthatāṃ vijijñāpayipuruṣadeśāderānantyādinā kartumaśakyatavādidaṃ vyāptiviṣayaṃ vākyamāha“yaḥ sāsnādimānsa gośabdārthaḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1208_0: yadvā yaḥ pṛthivīti padaṃ vā vyaktiviśeṣasya tadathartāṃ vāvagacchaṃstatpravṛttinimittaṃ
GSP33nysu__2u:1208_1: jijñāsate taṃ prati pṛthivītvavatī prathivīti pṛthivītvaṃ pṛthivīśabdapravṛttinimittamucyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1209: tatra yasya vaktaryāptatābuddhiḥ sa tāvatā santuṣyati /
GSP33nysu__2u:1211_0: athavāsti gaurnāmārtha iti viditavato yatra tatra gavi ghaṭādāvaśvādau ca gobuddhau
GSP33nysu__2u:1212: idamapi pūvarvadāptatvāvadhāraṇānavadhāraṇābhyāṃ dvayāṃ gatimavalambata iti kimatrānupapannam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1217: tatra kiṃ gaurvyavahārasya viśeṣaṇaṃ gośabdo vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:1218: ādye yadyasau goviśiṣṭaṃ vyavahāraṃ nājñāsīt tadā kathaṃ purovartivyaktau tasya kartavyatāmanumānādapi jānīyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1226: naivaṃ gośabda ityasti viśeṣa iti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1231: atha satyapi gotve tadanyatra tadaprayogānneti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1232: evaṃ tarhi yatra sāsnādimattvaṃ nāsti tatra gośabdaprayogo 'pi nāsti,
GSP33nysu__2u:1233: yatra sāsnādimattvamasti tatra sarvatrāstīti yo jānīte taṃ prati lakṣaṇābhidhānamiti syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1239: upadeśādinā viśeṣaṇena gavā viśeṣitaṃ vyavahāramavagatavo hi tadanyatra tatkartavyatānumānasādhyetyaṅgīkāre ko virodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1240: śabdaviśeṣitavyavahārakartavyatāsādhane 'tiprasaṅgaḥ kiṃ bodhyasya bodhakasya veti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1247: nahi bodhyo bādhaparicayaśūnya ityetāvatā paricitabādhenāpi bodhakena viparītaṃ bodhanīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1254: na hyevamasmābhiḥ pratijñātaṃ yatsarvathā śāstrāntarasādhyaṃ tannocyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1257: yadi ca śāstrāntarasādhyo 'pyartho bhavadīyaśāstrasya viṣayaḥ tarhi vyākaraṇādisādhyamanyadapi kasmānnocyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:1259: sandigdhatādisadbhāve 'pi yadavacanaṃ taduktadiśā śiṣyaireva śakyajñānatvāditi yatkiñcidetat /
GSP33nysu__2u:1261: tenāpi hi smṛtirūpaḥ paratra pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāso 'dhyāsa ityādīni lakṣaṇāni svaśāstre nibaddhāni /
GSP33nysu__2u:1263: tatraite doṣāstāni lakṣaṇāni kiṃ samāskandantyuta neti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1269: āpātato 'pi duṣyānāṃ tathātve kathamunmattabhāṣitānāmapi tadbhāvo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1272: kiñcaivaṃ vadatā prāgbrahmasākṣātkārādbādhyamavyāvahārikaṃ brahmasākṣātkārabādhyaṃ vyāvahārikamiti matamapi parityaktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1275: kiñcaivamasmadīyamapi lakṣaṇaṃ kuto na vyavahāraṃ nirvahet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1298: tadeva mānatvaṃ mānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ mālakṣaṇamiti yāvat yadyapi sāsnādimāngauritivadyathārthaṃ pramāṇamityukte 'pi bhavatyeva lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvapratītiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1300: tataśca pṛthaṅnirūpyamapi syāttanmā śaṅkīti yāthārthyameva mānatvaṃ na tu sāsnādimattvādgotvamiva tato 'tiriktamityuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1304: yāvastvekaḥ śabdo niveśayitumiṣyaḥ, yāvanti cetarasmādvayāvartanīyāni tānyucyante lakṣyāṇīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1322: ata eva kaṇādaḥ kriyāvadguṇavatsamavāyikāraṇamiti kriyāvattvamapi dravyalakṣaṇatvenāha /
GSP33nysu__2u:1331: atra pṛthivyādīni navāpi pakṣīkṛtyaitāni dravyāṇi kriyāvattvāditi prayoktavyam,
GSP33nysu__2u:1339: yeṣāṃ ca sa doṣasteṣāmapyupadeśādinā ghaṭāderdravyatvaniścaye sati taditaramūrtapakṣīkāreṇa dravyatvasādhane kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syādityalam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1345: pramitiḥ pramāṇam, pramīyate 'neneti pramāṇamiti bhāvakaraṇayoḥ pramāṇaśabdasya sāmarthyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1353: kinnāma kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kriyāśrayayordhāraṇakriyāṃ prati ya ādhārastatkārakam /

GSP33nysu__2u:2110: prāptipratibandhakaṃ hi kuḍyādivyavadhānamiti prāptyarthaṃ tadabhāvo 'nveṣaṇīyaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2111: sā yadi neṣyate tadā kuḍyādikaṃ kasyāpakuryāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2115: atha nayanaviṣayayormadhye nibiḍa(ḍāvayava)dravyābhāvo vivakṣita iti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:2119: atha kṣaṇabhaṅgapariṇāmāvāśritya tathābhūtasyotpādānutpādau eva yogyatāyogyate manyase,
GSP33nysu__2u:2125: asmākaṃ tu nayanaraśmayaḥ samyagāsannena sannikṛṣṭante viprakṛṣṭena tvasamyak pradīparaśmaya iveti yukte pratītervaiśadyāvaiśadye /
GSP33nysu__2u:2126: kācādyantaritopalabdhyā kimaprāpyaprakāśakatvaṃ kalpayāmaḥ kiṃvā kācādīnāṃ praptipratibandhakatvābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2133: yathā khalu dīpo raśmibhirarthasannikṛṣṭo 'pi svarūpāpekṣayā sāntara iti pratīyate tathā cakṣurapyadhiṣṭhānāpekṣayeti kimanupapannam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2155: gatvā nārthena sannikṛṣṭata ityatra kiṃ gatipratiṣedhaḥ sādhyaḥ,
GSP33nysu__2u:2165: sannikarṣārthaṃ gatimanna bhavatīti sādhyamiti cenna sparśanādāvanaikāntyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2172: mahattejojātīyamaindriyakamupalabdhamiti cet cākṣuṣamapyupalabdhamiti vāristhaṃ tathā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2176: yadi ca nayanaṃ nirgatyārthaṃ gṛhīyāttadā unmīlyanimīlane 'pi arthapratipattiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2178: vākṣamadhiṣṭhānātiriktaṃ syādadhiṣṭhānopaghātacikitse vyarthe syātāmiti tu pradīpena samānayogakṣemam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2181: tapāvalokanena nayanasyāśiśiratvamātapopaviṣyasyāpi śiśiradravyāvalokanena śiśiratvaṃ caitamevārthaṃ gamayataḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2186: yadakṣaviśeṣaṇaṃ nirdoṣatvamuktaṃ tadvayavacchedyaṃ darśayitumakṣabhedaṃ tāvadāha- prākṛmiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2187: prākṛtaṃ śuddhacaitanyamakṣaṃ tu dvividhaṃ matam // MAnuv_2,1.28ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:2196: vendriyabhedāddvividhamiti jalpatāṃ jainānāṃ ca mataṃ vyavacchinatti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2200: jaḍasya ca nityāhaṅkārikabhautikatvam“sūkṣmendriyāṇi santyeva syuḥ sthūlānyapyahaṅkṛteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2204: ghrāṇaṃ pārthivaṃ rasāvyañjakatve sati gandhavyañjakatvāt kuṅkumagandhābhivyañjakaghṛtavat /
GSP33nysu__2u:2208: sparśanaṃ vāyavīyaṃ śabdāvyañjakatve sati spaśarvyañjakatvāt vyajanavātavaditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:2249: atastatra prākṛtaṃ śuddhaṃ ceti dvividhamapyastīti svīkāryam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2262: sarvatra prākṛte cākṣe nirdoṣatvaṃ sadoṣatvaṃ cobhayaṃ kālādibhedeneṣyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2271: ta(a)taḥ prākṛtenaiva savarsyopapatteḥ saṃsāriṣu śuddhendriyābhyupagamo nirbīja eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:2291: tatsukhādiviṣayamindriyaṃ tāvadbaliṣṭhatamaṃ sarvathā(pya)'bādhyaṃ mataṃ sarveṣāṃ sammatam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2292: na hi kadācidapyasati sukhe ahaṃ sukhīti pratyayo 'sti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2297: nirdoṣatvātiniyamaśca śuddhasyaiva dharmo na prākṛtasyeti sukhādiviṣayasyendriyasya śuddhatāsiddhiriti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2302: yadyapi muktānāṃ śuddhendriyavattvena saṃsāriṇāṃ tadvattā śakyasādhanā tasya tatsvarūpatāvagamāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2314: yatpañcendriyamanobhedādindriyaṃ ṣaḍvidhamiti smṛtaṃ tatprākṛtaṃ na tu sarvamityato na virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2325: yadindriyaṃ yaṃ viśeṣaguṇaṃ gṛhṇāti tat tadvaditi vyāpteḥ sukhādigrāhiṇi manasi,
GSP33nysu__2u:2341: kramaprāptaṃ kevalamanupramāṇaṃ ca anumānaṃ lakṣayati- anumeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2346: yadi ca yuktereva bahuśaḥ prakṛtatvāttatsvarūpajijñāsāyāmidaṃ pravṛttam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2352: sādhanaprāmāṇyapakṣe 'pyapakṣe 'apyanumīyate 'nayeti karaṇasādhano 'numāśabdo yamarthamācaṣṭe tameva yujyate 'nayeti yuktiśabdo 'pi /
GSP33nysu__2u:2354: atrāpi vyavahāra eva sādhyo na tvanumātvaṃ, yuktitvaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:2357: nanu yuktyupapattiśabdāvekārthau tathā cānyatra nirdoṣopapattiranumetyādau yadi nirdoṣagrahaṇasya vyāvartyamasti tadātrāpi tatkartavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2360: ucyate asti khalu śabdānāṃ mukhyāmukhyabhedena dvayī vṛttiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2361: evañcopapattiśabdādupapattāviva tadābhāse 'pi pratipattāvutpannāyāṃ tadvayavacchedena mukhyārthopadarśanārthaṃ tatra nirdoṣagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2369: kinnāma yujyate sambaddhayate iti yuktiranumokteti yojyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2372: prameyatvādikaṃ hyanityatvādinā yujyate, na yujyate ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:2374: tadanena sāhityaniyamavat vyāpyaṃ, liṅgam, anumānamiti cocyata ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2378: vaiśeṣikāstvasyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ sambandhyekārthasamavāyi virodhi ceti laiṅgikanimittasambandhānparisañcakṣate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2423: yo 'gnimānna bhavati sa dhūmavānna bhavatīti vyatirekavyāptiḥ kiṃ dhūmenāgnisādhane upayujyate kiṃvāgnyabhāvena dhūmābhāvasādhane /
GSP33nysu__2u:2429: yadabhāvayorvyāpyavyāpakabhāvastayoreva sādhyasādhanabhāva ityabhyupagame nātiprasaṅga iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2431: yadabhāvayorvyāpyavyāpakabhāvastayoreva sādhyasādhanabhāva ityabhyupagame nātiprasaṅga iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2433: yadabhāvo yadabhāvasya vyāpakaḥ sa tasya vyāpya iti niyamādadoṣa iti cet(na) /
GSP33nysu__2u:2438: kinnāma sāpyanvayarūpaiveti na sarvathā vyāptidvaividhyaṃ sambhavatīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2451: vyāptimātramevānumānāṅgaṃ na punaḥ sapakṣe tadupadarśanamapītyato vyatirekayorvyāptyā tadupapādanaṃ kriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2453: jīvaccharīraṃ sātmakaṃ prāṇādimattvāt yatprāṇādimattatsātmakaṃ prāṇādimaccedaṃ tasmātsātmakamiti prayukte dhūmasyāgninevāsya na vyāptirdṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2458: tadetāvati vaktavye yadanyathā prayujyate tadvivekināṃ sphuṭapratītikatayā saṅgraharucitayā veti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2461: vyāpyaṃ cedanumānaṃ tadā dhūmaḥ śabdānityatve 'pyanumānaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2465: tathāca yo yena vyāpyaḥ sa tasminnanumānamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2486: caturthāstu parasparaṃ vyāpyavyāpakabhāvādanyonyamanumānatāmarhantaḥ prasiddhayaprasiddhibhyāṃ viśiṣṭanta iti saṅkṣepaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2488: nanvevamapi dhūmenāgnijñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ syādityata uktaṃ smṛteti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2495: tathāpi gṛhī(tavismṛ)tāsmṛtavyāptestadavasthaḥ prasaṅga ityata uktaṃ smṛteti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2504: sya yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti vyāptismaraṇasyānantaramayaṃ cāgnivyāptadhūmavāniti pratisandhānātmakaṃ yaddhūmajñānaṃ tattṛtīyamanumānamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2509: tato vyāptismṛtau satyāṃ kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ tṛtīyaṃ jñānameṣyavyamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2513: naca tatsaṅkalitatvaṃ vinā tṛtīyajñānāditi kathaṃ tannaiṣyavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2521: yadā tu gṛhītavyāptervināpi liṅgadarśanādvacanādinaiva vyāptismṛtirāvirasti yadā dvitīyameva liṅgadarśanaṃ pratisandhānātmakamudeṣyatīti nāvaśyambhāvinīyaṃ prakriyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:2522: yathā khalu saṃskārasāhitye satīndriyasannikarṣādeva so 'yamiti pratyabhijñā jāyate tathe(thātrāpī)
GSP33nysu__2u:2539: nanu yo dhūmavānso 'gnimāniti vyāptyuktiḥ kathaṃ pratyāyanāṅgam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2546: prathamata eva vyāptyukterasaṅgatatvādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharan“uktā vyāptireva sā';
GSP33nysu__2u:2556: yo hi parvatamagnimantaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ pareṇa niragnikaṃ manyamānena kiṃ parvatasyāgnimatve mānamityanuyujyate,
GSP33nysu__2u:2557: sa yadi yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti vyāptimātraṃ (paraṃ prati)
GSP33nysu__2u:2560: kiṃvā (kiñcā)paraṃ vaktavyamavaśiṣyaṃ yadarthaṃ śabdānta(ramavaśiṣyaṃ)raṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2570: vyadhikaraṇo 'pi hi kṛttikāgata evodayo rohiṇyudayāsattiṃ gamayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2572: tatastāvadanena vaktavyaṃ yāvatā vyāptivivakṣitasthaladharmatopetatayā liṅgasyānusandhānaṃ syāt tadapyākāṅkṣākrameṇābhidhātavyamiti sthite,
GSP33nysu__2u:2573: nirāśrayasya pramāṇasyābhidhātumaśakyatvāt pramāṇajijñāsotthāpanāya viṣayopakṣeparūpaṃ parvato 'gnimāniti pratijñāvākyaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2579: tadevametāvati vaktavye kathaṃ vyāptimātramuktvā kṛtī syāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:2584: tathāpyākāṅkṣitatvālliṅgasvarūpasya tatpakṣadharmatāyāśca pratipādanāya hetūpanayau vaktavyāviti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2587: kiṃ yena dhūmavattvaṃ parvatavṛttitayāvagataṃ taṃ prati hetūpanayau vaktavyau, uta viparītaṃ prati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2594: taccedvijñānaṃ parasya svatassiddhaṃ tadā kiṃ hetūpanayābhyāmiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2596: yadi liṅgamasiddhaṃ syāt kuta evāsya mānatā // MAnuv_2,1.32cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:2606: viparatītasya tu vyāpyatvāsiddhayā tatpramāṇameva na bhavati (iti)
GSP33nysu__2u:2623: tathāca viditaliṅgasvarūpapakṣadharmatvaṃ prati tatsmārakatvena liṅgatayānusandhāyakatvenetaraṃ prati tajjijñāsājanakatvena hetūpanayayoḥ sārthakyamevetyāśaṅkayāha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2624: yadi smārakamātraṃ syāt smarturnātra prayojanam // MAnuv_2,1.33ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:2637: petasya liṅgasya smaraṇānusandhānajijñāsājanakaṃ syāditi yadyucyate tanna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2638: yato vyāptivacanenaiva tatsmaraṇādimatastasya hetvādinā prayojanaṃ nāstīti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:2640: yadi hi hetvādikaṃ vākyatayā pratyāyakaṃ syāttadā samārthyacintopayujyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2641: yadā tu tatsmārakatvādinaivopayuktaṃ tadā saṃskārodbodhopayuktaṃ sādṛśyasambandhādikaṃ kimapyanve(pye)ṣyavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2643: yo dhūmavānasāvagnimānityabhihite khalvanumānamudrāvit atra dhūmavattvaṃ vyāpyamityavabudhyata eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:2649: ādye tu syāde(vedaṃ)vaṃ paravyutpāditarītyā (vākyaparimāṇaṃ) vākyaṃ pramāṇaṃ kathañcit /
GSP33nysu__2u:2655: parepadeśaṃ vākyaṃ yadi smaraṇādimātrakāraṇamaṅgīkriyate tadātra vyāptivacane satyeva smarturvyāptivacanādeva smaraṇādyutpatteriti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:2656: atra vyāptivacanātirikte śabde prayojanaṃ nāstīti nāsāvavaśyaṃ vaktavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2659: tatra vakturāptatvāvadhāraṇādanusaraṇaṃ prativādini tu tannāstīti cenmā bhūt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2666: kiṃ prakaraṇādyāpannatayāyaṃ na vadatyutāpratipannatvādineti sandehasya prakṛte 'pi tulyatvāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:2674: tathāca pratijñāvākyena viṣayamupakṣipya tatra hetunā pramāṇasvarūpamupadarśya tasyodāharaṇavākyena viruddhānadhyavasitānaikāntikatvanirāsaḥ kriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2677: sādhyānuvādena (tu)agnimāneva na tu niragnika iti bādhapratipakṣapratikṣepaḥ kriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2680: evaṃ vadatā hi ('pi) yāvatā vivādāvasānaṃ tāvānparopadeśa ityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2693: dṛṣṭāntādiṣu caivaṃ syāt sādhanaṃ punareva hi // MAnuv_2,1.34ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:2716: tathāpyavāntarākāṅkṣānivartakatvena pañcāvayavamevāvāntaravākyaṃ parisamāpyata ityata āha- liṅgeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2721: evaṃ sati kimatra pramāṇamityavāntarākāṅkṣānivṛttihetau dhūmatvamiti liṅgoktau kṛtāyāmapi avāntaravākyaparyavasānamavaśyaṃ bhavatīti tanmātrameva vākyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2724: yaduktaṃ smaraṇādimātrahetutvena vākyasyopayogastacca vyāptivacanamātreṇa bhavatīti vyāptireva vaktavyeti tadayuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2738: doṣaparijñāna eva tadviyuktā yuktiḥ sujñānetyato yuktidoṣo nirūpaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2757_1: bādhalakṣaṇamayogyatvaṃ virodha iti śiṣyairevohyatāmityāśayavānasaṅgatiṃ nirūpayati- pratijñāyāmiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2767: nanu kathaṃ dve evānumānadūṣaṇe paraparigaṇitānāmasiddhatvādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ sattvādityatasteṣāmatrāntarbhāvaṃ vibhāvayitu virodhavibhāgamāha- virodho 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2771: asaṅgatirapyanekavidheti vā tridhaiva na tvekavidhaiva yenāsiddhayādīnāmantarbhāvo durghaṭaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2781: yatrārthe liṅgapramitiḥ sādhyasiddhayupayoginī tatra tadabhāvo liṅgarāhityam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2786: naca sādhanasya tadbhāve 'pi viruddhasya sādhyatā sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2797: nanvevaṃ sati siddhasādhanatāpi virodha eva syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2804: naca siddhasādhanasya sākāṅkṣatā astīti nāsau virodhe 'ntarbhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2806: nanu cānyatra trividho virodha ityādinā liṅgarāhityāvyāptyorekatāmupādāya sādhyasya sādhanasya vānugamo dṛṣṭāntavirodhastṛtīyatayā parigṛhītaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2817_0: svārthānumāne hi dṛṣṭavyāptikasya liṅgasya vivakṣitasthale siddhimātreṇa sādhyapramitirutpadyata
GSP33nysu__2u:2819: tvavyāptyaupayikasyāpi dṛṣṭāntadoṣasya tadāśrayatayā pratītatvena tathaivodbhavanīyatājñāpanāya tena saha trividhatvamanyatroktamiti na virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2828: sādhyādyavyāptistu dṛṣṭāntasya guṇa eva na doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2829: sato hi satā vyāptiṃ pradarśayituṃ dṛṣṭānto 'nveṣyavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2830: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasyāyaṃ doṣa iti cetsa eva kimarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2833: pāramparyeṇopayogo tu sādharmyadṛṣṭānta evāsāviti kiṃ pṛthagupādānena /
GSP33nysu__2u:2837: nahi sarvatra dṛṣṭānta eva vyāptirupadarśanīyetyasti niyamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2845: satyapi sambandhe tadabhāvenāpi sambandhaḥ, sādhyābhāvavyā(pta)pyatā ceti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2858: api ca vyavahāro 'pi pratijñārthaviruddhatayopapadyate, na kālātītatvādinā, vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2863: pramāṇatadābhāsāviveka eva hi pramāṇaśabdaprayogo na tvaprāmāṇyaniścaye /
GSP33nysu__2u:2864: ahīnabalatayā vā viśeṣaṇe sambhavati tadavāntarabhedopādānaṃ niratharkameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:2866: liṅgarāhityagrahaṇena cādūṣaṇānāmapi dūṣaṇatayā paraparigaṇitānāmāśrayavyadhikaraṇasādhyānyathāsiddhīnāṃ nirāso labhyate anyathāsiddherdūṣaṇatve 'pi prakārāntasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2869: anadhyavasitatvādibhedo 'pi kiṃ vyāptyabhāve sambhavatītyetāvatā parisaṅkhayeyo vyavahāropayogitvādvā /
GSP33nysu__2u:2874: nedaṃ sādhakamanaikāntikatvādityasya hi sapakṣavṛttitve sati vipakṣavṛttitvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2880: śiṣyamativaiśadyāya vyutpādanaṃ tvanumatameveti na svīyavyavahāravirodha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2896: tatkiṃ kṛtakatvaṃ kṛśānuśaityaṃ vā śabdanityatvaṃ vā sādhayituṃ svayameva pravṛttam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2903: yathā niśātam kṛśānuśaityādau vyāpārayanpuruṣa evāparādhī syāt natu kṛtakatvādikamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2907: tataḥ kṛśānuśaityādeḥ sādhyatānarhatvaṃ nityatvādisādhane kṛtakatvāderasamarthatvamityādirarthaśabdagata eva doṣo 'ṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2908: na hyupādhimantarbhāvya bhavan doṣo na doṣo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2919: tena sādhanasya hiṃsātvādervailomyaṃ sādhyāpekṣayā vaiparītyamavyāptatvamiti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:2923: sādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpako hi dharma upādhiḥ,
GSP33nysu__2u:2933: vyāptijñānādhīnamupādhijñānaṃ tadadhīnaṃ ca nirupādhikatvajñānaṃ tadāyattaṃ vyāptijñānamiti cakrakaprasaṅgena tasya vyāptilakṣaṇatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2940: vastutastu yo dharmo yadvayāpakāvyāptastasya tenāvyāptirityeva vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2942: sādhanasya sādhyavyāpakaparityāgo hi pakṣādanyatra vā syātpakṣe vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:2945: dvitīye tu sādhyavyāpakasya pakṣādvayāvṛttiḥ sādhyamapi vyāvartayatīti satpratipakṣataiva /
GSP33nysu__2u:2947: nahi yadabhāvo yatra dūṣaṇaṃ so 'pi tatra dūṣaṇamiti yukta virodhāditi parāstam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2949: etadarthaṃ ca sādhyavyāpakasya vailomyaṃ pakṣādvayāvṛttiḥ sādhanasya satpratipakṣateti yojanīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2952: nanu ca prāganumānādapi satpratipakṣatānumānottaramavyāptirvā kinna syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2955: naca vyāptigrahaṇasamaye pakṣādipravibhāgo 'stīti kathaṃ tadā pratipakṣatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2958: tathāca sādhyarahite tatra vartamānaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhyaṃ vyabhicaratīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2963: tarhi vyāpakavyāvṛttyā pratipakṣeṇaivānumāne dūṣite kiṃ tadupajīvinā vyabhicāreṇeti tulyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2965: kiñca pakṣe vyabhicāraḥ kiṃ niścita uta sandigdhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2974: upādheḥ sādhyavyāpakatvaniścaye tadvayāvṛttyā sādhyavyāvṛttiniścayaḥ sati ca tasminnasāviti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2976: kathaṃ tadvayāvṛttyā pakṣe sādhanasya niścito vyabhicāraḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2977: pakṣe sandigdho vyabhicārastu svata eva siddho sopādhimukhanirīkṣaṇāpekṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2982: anukūlatarkādinā sādhyavyāpakatvaniścaye sati pakṣe niścitavyabhicāritāsiddhiriti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2984: tathāpi sopādhikatvaṃ satpratipakṣatvamiti gataḥ pakṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2987: nirdhārite tu sāmarthye bādhako vā syāt,
GSP33nysu__2u:2990: atra sopādhikatvamiti vaktavye sādhyavyāpakavailomyamiti vacanamupādhilakṣaṇasyāpi pradarśanārtham /
GSP33nysu__2u:3010: tadidamiṣyamapi tyajati aniṣyamapi gṛhṇātīti na viśeṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3016: upādheḥ syāttadā tasya samavyāptiryadā bhavet'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3019: kiṃ viṣamavyāptikasya vyāpyatvābhāvāttatsambandhena sādhanābhimate vyāpyatābhramānupapatteradoṣatvena tadvayavacchedāya samapadamiti,
GSP33nysu__2u:3031: nanu ca viṣamavyāptikasya pratipakṣonnāyakatvaṃ na sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:3045: asammatau tu tatra doṣāntarameva bhaviṣyatīti kimanupapannam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3046: nanu śaṅkitopādhau kathaṃ pratipakṣaḥ sandigdhāsiddhiprasaṅgenāsamabalatvāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:3051: sādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ kimupādhisāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kiṃvā viśeṣalakṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3055: naca sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakasya yatkiñcidavacchinnasādhyavyāpakasya ca nopādhitvamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3069: yathā samavāyaḥ sambandhatve sati samavetatvena hīno 'kāryatvādākāśavat /
GSP33nysu__2u:3073: śabdo na sparśavadviśeṣaguṇaḥ pratyakṣatve satyakāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvādityādāviva vyabhicāraparihārārthatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3075: yathā vāyuḥ spārśano na bhavati dravyatve satyacākṣuṣatvāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:3078: yo yatsādhyavyāpako yatsādhanāvyāpaka iti vāsyārtha iti sarvaṃ sustham /
GSP33nysu__2u:3085: evaṃ tarhi durbalena virodho 'pi pratijñārthaviruddhatā syāt,
GSP33nysu__2u:3090: prakaraṇādivaśāddhi sāmānyaśabdā api viśeṣe vatarnta iti prasiddham /
GSP33nysu__2u:3091: yathā viśiṣṭasamaye puruṣamānayetyukte puruṣaviśeṣa evānīyate na tu yaḥ ko 'pi puruṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3108: svavākyena virodhe 'pi naiva sādhakatāṃ vrajet // MAnuv_2,1.38ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3111: na kevalaṃ pramāṇavirodhe, kintu svavākyena virodhe 'pi pramāṇaṃ naiva sādhakatāṃ vrajet /
GSP33nysu__2u:3125: svavākyavirodhe hi kiṃ sādhanasyobhayābhimatyā (pakṣe) vyabhicāro bhavet, kiṃvānyarābhimatyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3133: kinnāma tadanapekṣasya pratyakṣāderapi tathā cānyatropalabdhasāmarthyasyānumāne 'pi svātantryasiddhirityāśayavatā prastāvādanumānamiti vaktavye pramāṇamityevādhikṛtam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3138: pramāṇavirodhe hi heturapakṣadharmo vā syāt anaikāntiko vā (syāt) /
GSP33nysu__2u:3143: yadi hi pakṣaṃ vihāya bahirevāvinābhāvo 'vagamyate tadā bahirvyāptibalena pakṣadharmo 'pi heturna pakṣe sādhyaṃ sādhayet /
GSP33nysu__2u:3144: asiddhā hi tatra tasya sādhyena vyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3152: api ca kiṃ vyāptigrahaṇasamaye 'vyāpterupasthāpakaḥ pramāṇavirodhaḥ syāt,
GSP33nysu__2u:3167: saṃvādānuktisaṃyuktā eta eva ca nigrahāḥ // MAnuv_2,1.38cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:3171: nanu ca pratijñāhānyādīnāṃ vaktṛdoṣāṇāṃ kathamarthavacanadoṣeṣu virodhāsaṅgatinyūnādhikyeṣvanupraveśa ityata uktam- saṃvādānuktisaṃyuktāṃ iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3179: tatrānumānasyaiva yadasādhāraṇaṃ virodhādi tatrānumānadoṣāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ praveśo 'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3183: nanu keyaṃ kathā nāmetyapekṣāyāṃ tatsvarūpaṃ nirūpayansāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāgamuddeśaṃ cāha- vāda iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3184: vādo jalpo vitaṇḍeti kathāstisro vijānatām // MAnuv_2,1.39ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3192: tāśca kathā vādādibhedena tisraḥ trividhā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3203: tuśabdena tattvanirṇayasādhanādapi jalpaviśeṣāt taduddeśena pravṛttatvavailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayita /
GSP33nysu__2u:3204: yadā tu viditatattvau vītarāgāvaviditatattvaiḥ parairabhyarthitau kathāṃ kurutastadā tatrāvyāptemetallakṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3206: anyatrānantarbhāvena tisra ityasya vyāghātādityata uktam- svārthaṃ parārthamapi veti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3229: sadbhiḥ svasiddhāntamaprakāśyāsādhayitvāsatāṃ pakṣasya dūṣaṇameva kriyate yatsā vitaṇḍetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3230: prativādinaḥ svapakṣasādhanena vinā parapakṣapratikṣepamātreṇa paryavasyantī kathā vitaṇḍetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:3234: tattvajñānāyogyānasataḥ prati sadbhiḥ svasiddhāntasādhane teṣāṃ tattvajñānotpādaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3240: naca svapakṣasādhanahīnāyāṃ vitaṇḍāyāṃ tatsambhavatītyata āha- ukta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3241: ukte taiḥ prathamaṃ māne vaktavyaṃ tasya dūṣaṇam // MAnuv_2,1.41cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:3243: tairasadbhiḥ prathamaṃ svapakṣasādhanāya māne ukte sati sadbhistasya mānasya dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3244: asato vādibhūtasya svapakṣasādhanaṃ parapakṣanirākaraṇaṃ ca karaṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3247: tata etāmeva saṅgatimāśritya ṭīkākṛtā tatraiva vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3253: tayorvivāho vādaśca nottamādhamayoḥ kvacit'; iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3255: anyathātyantāpakṛṣṭo 'pyutkṛṣṭatamena vaiyātyāt ghaṭamāno yadi vā daivāyattamabhibhāvayet tadā vṛthākhyātiṃ labheta /
GSP33nysu__2u:3263: vidyāparīkṣāpūrvaiva vitaṇḍā jalpa eva ca // MAnuv_2,1.42ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3265: vidyāparīkṣā pūrvā kāraṇabhūtā yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3266: vidyāparīkṣayā niścitasāmyayoreva vitaṇḍā dātavyā, na viṣamavidyayoḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3271: nanu jalpavitaṇḍārthinovirdyāsāmyādiniścayāya kartavyā parīkṣā kiṃ kathayā, utānyathā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3283: yato vidyayoccatvena nirṇītatvameva jayo nīcatvena nirṇītatvaṃ ca parājaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3291: tattvanirṇītiṃ vinoccanīcatvavijñānaṃ na hītyevokte vinā vādeneti vakṣyamāṇavirodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3296: tathāpi taduddeśenāpravṛttestādarthvasya prathamamaniścayānna tadarthaṃ jalpo dātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:3316: tau ca vāda eva sambhavato na jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3324: tena vādenaiva tasya nīcoccabhāvasya siddhau satyāmanyayorjalpavitaṇḍayorvyarthatā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3330: prāk parīkṣāto lokasaṃvādādinānyatarasya pratiyogyapekṣayā bahuvidyatvasiddhau tu vādo 'pi naiva dātavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3337: vādo hi vidyāparīkṣākāraṇamityeṣyavyo na tu vyasanitayā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3338: tatphalaṃ tvanyata eva jātamiti kiṃ parīkṣayā kiṃ tadaṅgena vādeneti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3349: yataḥ sabhādipūrvastataḥ spardhināmapi vādo yujyata eveti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3355: tathācābhilaṣitaṃ na siddham, siddhaṃ cānabhilaṣitamiti tatrāha- ubhayeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3362: vidyāparīkṣārthe vāde jayino 'rthādikamapi sabhāpatinā sampādanīyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3363: evaṃ tarhi na kadāpi jalpavitaṇḍāpravṛttiḥ“vyartharatānyayoḥ'; iti yukteḥ sama(māna)tvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3366: naca phalāntaramasti yena punarjalpavitaṇḍārambhaḥ syādityata āha- tattvāprakāśa eveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3376: yadvā tattvanirṇayaphalo vādaḥ arthādiphale jalpavitaṇḍe, iti phalabhedena kathābheda uktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3378: tathā satyarthādīnāṃ bhedena kathā'nantyaprasaṅgādityata āha- tattveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3379: yadyapi arthādayo 'vāntarabhedabhinnāstathāpi tattvāprakāśa eka eva vitaṇḍājalpayoḥ phalam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3385: vinā vādena vidyāyā yadi śakyaṃ parīkṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3390: tadā samavidyayoḥ prathamamapi jalpādiḥ kathāviśeṣaḥ kāryaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3391: tarhi vidyāparīkṣaṇaṃ vādenaivetyuktivirodha ityata āha- vā eveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3394: vāda eva prathamaṃ kartavyo bhavediti yaduktaṃ tadanyathā vādena vinā vidyāparīkṣaṇasya kartumaśakyatva evāto na virodha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3403: athavā samāhārarūpaṃ kathāntaraṃ yadvā nimittadvayasamāveśe vādaśabdasyaiva vyavahārānupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3405: jalpa ityapi nāma syād vādasyaitādṛśasya tu // MAnuv_2,1.48ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3408: etādṛśasya nimittadvayopetasyātra jalpa iti nāma syādityabhyupagamenādyo nirastaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3414: vādasya jalpa ityapi nāma syāditi vādasaṃjñā tu mukhyā jalpasaṃjñā tvamukhyeti sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3418: yadyapi kathakāvādito vijigīṣū tathāpi sabhyādibhivirjigīṣāṃ paribhāvyotpāditā tattvanirṇayārthitaiva kathopayoginī /
GSP33nysu__2u:3419: arthādilābhaścāntarā prāpto na tvādita evoddiṣya ityamukhya eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3420: ata eva pūrva ubhayārthaḥ syādityukte sāmyapratītiprasaktau nirṇītijayakāraka iti tattvanirṇīteḥ prādhānyapradarśanārthaṃ vivaraṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3428: sa ca vādasambandhyevāsyāṃ kathāyāmastītyato vādatvameva mukhyamityāśayavānāha- pratijñeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3432: vidyāparīkṣārthāyāṃ kathāyāṃ kvāpi prameye pratijñāmātreṇa pramāṇopanyāsarahitena vacanena sādhyatvaṃ prajñāpanīyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3442: evambhāvo hi vādiprativādinoḥ saṃvāde 'nyonyāptatā'śvāse satyeva syāt tadāśvāso hi vāda eva sambhavati na jalpe /
GSP33nysu__2u:3452: na hyekatrāptaḥ sarvatrāpta eveti niyamo 'stīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3453: yājñavalkyenāpi tatra tatra pramāṇopanyāsaḥ kṛta eveti sakalamanākulam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3461: evaśabdau tu vaiṣṇavā eva rāgadveṣavihīnā eveti sambaddhayete /
GSP33nysu__2u:3475: evaṃ tarhi tairevālaṃ kiṃ sabhyairityata āha- etaditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:3479: kvacitsūkṣme prameye eteṣāṃ prāśnikānāṃ kāraṇāntaradvājñāne sati vādinorguṇadoṣanirṇayāya sabhyāśca pramāṇaṃ syuriti vakṣyamāṇenānvayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3481: yadyevaṃ prāśnikeṣvajñānaśaṅkayā sabhyānāṃ varaṇam, tadā teṣvapyajñānaśaṅkayānye 'pi varaṇīyāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3487: eṣāṃ sabhyānāṃ cājñāne sati dūragā deśāntarasthāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3499: ubhābhyāṃ sādhanaṃ caiva dūṣaṇaṃ vādajalpayoḥ // MAnuv_2,1.51ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3503: satāmeveti sārdhaślokasyātra sanniveśe tu, lakṣitau vādajalpau /
GSP33nysu__2u:3504: idānīṃ tu vitaṇḍāyā lakṣaṇadvayaṃ vivakṣustāvadupayuktamāha- ubhābhyāmiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3524: īśvarādiprameye mukhyo vedādirāgama eva vaktavyaḥ (tasya svātantryeṇa sādhyasiddhayaṅgatvāt) nānumānamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3544: saugato yadi dvayavayavaprayogaṃ kuryāttadā naiyāyikena nyūnena nigṛhyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:3548: tathāca niyatāvayavādivyatirekeṇa vitaṇḍaiva na syādityata āha- svasiddhānteti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3555: adūṣaṇe tu parapakṣādūṣaṇena kathābhāvaprasaṅgādityata āha- pratyakṣeti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3559: āgame tu vādinā prayukte prativādinā vaidikena tasyānyārthataiva daśarnīyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3578: śrutyādīnāṃ vedādīnāṃ śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā cetyuktānāṃ liṅgagrahaṇenaiva gṛhītatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3580: parārthe pramāṇānukūlyasya svārthe tatprātikūlyasya ca nirāso darśanīya ityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3587: naca vastutattva eva vādināṃ vipratipatteravaśyaṃ nyūnādyavatārasambhavenāprayogaprāptiriti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3589: yasya yatra tāttvikatvābhimānastena tatprayogānantaraṃ pareṇa nyūnādāvudbhāvite tathārūpatāyāḥ sādha(nīyatvāt)nāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3594: svasvaniyamasyaiva tātvikatvamupetya tadanatikrameṇaiva prayogāṅgīkāre tu sarvathā kathocchedāpatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3601: niyamād yo 'numāṃ brūyād taṃ brūyād yadi tādṛśī /
GSP33nysu__2u:3606: pañca pratijñāhetūdāhaṇopanayanigamanāni vāvayavā yasyāḥ sā tripañcāvayavā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3614: taṃ prati yaḥ saugato niyamādyugmāvayavinīṃ brūyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3615: sa yadi tādṛśī tryavayavā pañcāvayavā ca nānumeti brūyāditi yojyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3619: naiyāyikena saugataṃ prati pañcāvayavaprayoge vihite saugato 'dhikamiti nigṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3622: atha naiyāyikenāprāmāṇikatvamasiddhamiti vadatā kathamiti saugate pṛṣṭavati (sati)
GSP33nysu__2u:3629: iti bhāratādivākyamastīti cenna“saukṣmyaṃ saṅkhayākramaścaiva nirṇayaśca prayojanam';
GSP33nysu__2u:3640: na tāvadidamanumānaṃ tvaccetasi parivartamānaṃ paraṃ pratyāyanāṅgam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3642: tatra kiṃ pañcāvayavaprayogo 'sya vidhāsyate, atha dvayavayavaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3644: ***[NOTE: jump in verse numbering, no lacuna in text!]***
GSP33nysu__2u:3670: yasmātprayogeyattāsādhanaṃ vādiprativādibhyāmanyatareṇa vā svamataparityāgenānyamatābhyupagame kṛta evopapadyate nānyathā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3675: tadā dvayavayavasya tāttvikatvaṃ svayaṃ manyate na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3678: evaṃ kathābhāvaprasaṅgabhīruḥ saugato 'pi pañcāvayavena dvayavayavasyāvaśyakatāṃ pratipadyamānastattvaṃ manyate na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3682: asmādeva saṅkaṭādbibhyadudayano yathāvastu vaktavyamityuktvā yathāsiddhāntaṃ vā vaktavyamiti samayaṃ baddhvā pravṛttāyāṃ kathāyāṃ na nyūnādyavatāra iti pakṣāntaramavādīditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:3695: tatra kiṃ vākyārthamātraṃ sādhyate tadviśeṣo vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3698: dvitīye sa viśeṣaḥ pratīto na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3707: dvitīye tu nedaṃ vākyārthānumānaṃ kintu siddhe 'rthe vākyasya liṅgatānumānameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3728: api ca vedānusāreṇa paṭhyamāneṣu laukikavākyeṣu katham /
GSP33nysu__2u:3738: anubhūtiḥ pramāṇaṃ cet kena smṛtirapodyate // MAnuv_2,1.58ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3743: yadi smṛtirna pramā tadā smṛtiḥ lakṣaṇena vyāvartanīyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3764: saṃskārasya kāraṇatve 'pi nāsau sattāmātreṇa smṛtiṃ janayati kinnāmodbuddha eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3768: nacāvacchedakena vinā niyamo jñātuṃ śakyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3770: yadvā anubhūtiḥ pramāṇaṃ cettadā smṛtāvavyāptiriti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3773: smṛtiḥ kena nimittenāpodyate pramāṇādbahiḥ kriyate na kenāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3788: pūrvānubhūte kiṃ mānamityukte syāt kimuttaram // MAnuv_2,1.58cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:3790: yadi smṛtirapramāṇaṃ syāttadā pūrvānubhūte kiṃ mānamiti praśno niruttaraḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3796: anyathā sākṣātkāreṇa kāryeṇa karmakārakatayā ghaṭā(dya)numānamityapi syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3801: nanu yadi smṛtiḥ pramā syāttadā tatkāraṇasya saṃskārasyānupramāṇatvaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:3807: hi yasmāttatsmaraṇaṃ mānasaṃ manaḥpratyakṣajaṃ na saṃskārakaraṇakaṃ tato noktadoṣa iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3810: smaraṇasya mānasatvaṃ sākṣātkāratvaṃ ca kuta ityata āha- tacceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3818: nanvindriyāṇāṃ prāpyakāritvaniyamādatītena ca manasaḥ prāpterayogātkathaṃ smṛtermānasapratyakṣajatvamityata āha- atīteti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3827: tathāhi śrutiḥ“apaśyamapyaye māyayā viśvakarmaṇyado jagannihitaṃ śubhracakṣuḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3832: evañca yathā yogināmindriyeṇaivātītānāgatātharsākṣātkārastathātītamapi manasā smaryata iti ko doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3833: nanvindriyasyārthaprāptirnāma na saṃyogaḥ samavāyo veti niyamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3837: evaṃ tarhi manaso 'pi pūrvānubhavajanitasaṃskārasācivyalakṣaṇāstyatītārthena pratyāsattirityāśayavatoktam- pūrvānubhūtaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3840: yadi prāptiḥ saṃyogādilakṣaṇā vivakṣitā tadā tadabhāvo 'naikāntikaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3843: kāryadarśanavaśācceyaṃ kalpanāsau nātiprasaṅga iti darśayituṃ ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:3844: etena mānasaṃ cetsmaraṇaṃ syānna saṃskārajaṃ tadānanubhūte 'pyu(vyu)tpadyeteti parāstam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3851: etanmayā pūrvaṃ kṛtamityetanmayā manasā vijñātaṃ smṛtamapīti smaraṇasya mānasatvaṃ sākṣādanubhavātsākṣyanubhavena siddhamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3852: yaduktaṃ paraiḥ pūrvānubhavāvacchinnārthagocarā smṛtistadyāthārthyādikamanuvidadhānā na svayaṃ yathārtheti,
GSP33nysu__2u:3855: nanu manaso 'pratyakṣatvātkathaṃ smaraṇasya mānasatā sākṣipratyakṣagamyeti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:3857: tathāpi kāryakāraṇabhāvo na pratyakṣa iti cedanvayavyatirekasacivasya sākṣiṇastatra prāmāṇyābhyupagamāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3870: yasmānmānatrayamevaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ tasmādbrahmādivastuṣu veda eva pramāṇaṃ na yuktyādestatrāvakāśaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3881: ya(ta)smādvedaviṣaye na yukteravakāśastato virodho 'pi sa evokta ityupapannam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3903: dṛṣṭavyāptiviruddhatvāt tatra mānaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,1.62 //
GSP33nysu__2u:3909: dṛṣṭā pramitā vyāptiryasyā yukteḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3932: nanu“na vilakṣaṇatvāt'; ityanenaiva nyāyenāyamapi virodhaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3937: nityatvena vedaprāmāṇyasya sthitau tu viśeṣaṇāsiddhiniścaya eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3938: phalavyabhicāramātrasya hetutve tu anaikāntikatvamityevaṃ vyāptipakṣadharmatāvirahavyutpādanena yuktivirodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3948: tato 'nukūlatarkasanāthenopādhivyabhicārānupalambhasahakṛtena sahabhāgagrāhakeṇa pramāṇena siddhā mṛttvādīnāmavaktṛtvādinā vyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3954: nanu ca nityatayā vedasya prāmāṇye vyavasthite tadviruddhāyā yukterevāprāmāṇyamucitamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3968: tadevaṃ mṛdabravīdityādivedavākyānāṃ yuktiviruddhatvenāprāmāṇye vedatvāt“yato vā imāni (bhūtāni)
GSP33nysu__2u:3974: vedasya yukteśca niravakāśatvaṃ tata iti parāmṛśati /
GSP33nysu__2u:3977: asyāṃ śrutau vaktṛtvādinā pratipādyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4000: keṣāñciccetanānāṃ mṛdādyabhimānitvaṃ tatastacchabdānāṃ teṣu vṛvirvyāpakatvaṃ sadehatvamantardhānaśaktistatparatā ca śruterityanekasya kalpyamānatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4003: śrutirhi mṛdādīnāṃ vaktṛtvādikaṃ pratipādayati, yuktiśca tadabhāvam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4014: tathāca kathaṃ vedaprāmāṇye 'pi na dīyate dṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4034: tāni tāni mṛdādīni nāmāni vācakāni yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4042: yaccoktaṃ vacanavṛttyaṅgīkāraḥ prakṛtānupayogīti tatparihārāyoktaṃ tattanmṛdādivastvabhimānina iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4044: mṛdādiśabdānāṃ cetanaviṣayatāmātreṇa prakṛtavirodhaśāntāvapi vastusthitiṃ vijijñāpayiṣatā sūtrakāreṇa vyapadeśastviti tuśabdena mukhyavṛttiḥ sūcitā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4048: tataśca tadadhīnatvāditi nyāyena sa eva (tanmu)mukhyārtha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4050: nanvatra tannāmaka ityekavacanaṃ prakramya tattannāmāna iti bahuvacanaprayoge kinnimittam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4062: vyāptānāṃ sadehatve 'nupalambhabādha ityetatparihārāya viśeṣānugatibhyāmiti sūtrakhaṇḍaṃ kaścidanya iti tātparyato vyākhyātam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4071: tathāpyucyata iti pṛthivyādyabhimāninya ityāgamamapyatra saṃvā(dayati)dinaṃ darśayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:4073: tathāpyalpāctarasya pūrvanipātamanusṛtya pravṛttaṃ sūtramanugacchatā kramo bhagnaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4075: nanu ca pṛthivyādyabhimāninya iti vākyaṃ kathamupādeyam 'ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāśca hi',
GSP33nysu__2u:4088: etena“dṛśyate ca'; iti sūtraṃ vyākhyātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:4090: ye tu mīmāṃsakaṃmanyā vigrahavatī devatāṃ na sahante te 'pyanenaiva nirastā bhavanti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4093: anupalambhaḥ anekatra yugapatsannidhānaṃ ca śaktiviśeṣādupapadyate piśācādivat /
GSP33nysu__2u:4097: vakṣyati ca sūtrakāro“devādivat'; ityuktvā tatrāpi vipratipannaṃ prati“api lokaḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4100: naca cetano muktaḥ pralīno vā tadvācyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4113: satyāṃ vyutpattau śabdato devatāgamaḥ, sati ca tasminvyutpattiriti parasparāśrayatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4130: yadvā śāstroktavastuno 'pi śāstraliṅgato 'dhigatisambhavāttatra śabdasya vyutpattiryujyata iti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4136: yadvā śāstraṃ taistaiḥ praṇītaṃ tatsadbhāve liṅgam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4138: tataśca vacanaliṅgānumite vaktari vṛddhairanyānprati mṛdādiśabdāḥ śakyavyutpādanāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4142: tathāca tayānumite katarri śakya(ta)nta eva vṛddhaiḥ śa(bdo)bdā vyutpādayitum /
GSP33nysu__2u:4145: yathā khalu loke yathā mudgastathā mudgaparṇī,
GSP33nysu__2u:4149: tathā yaḥ pāśahastatvādimānso 'bādiśabdārtha iti vyutpādanaṃ suvacana(kara)meva /
GSP33nysu__2u:4154: tataścaivaṃ vedaprāmāṇyamākṣipato 'tīndriyātharvyavahāramātravilayaprasaṅga iti sūcayituṃ śāstroktavastunaśceti sāmānyenoktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4157: sākṣātkṛte tu mṛdādāveva prabalā tataśca devatānāṃ mukhyapratipādyatvamityayuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4160: vyutpattiḥ sā balavatī mūrkhavyutpattitā hi yat // MAnuv_2,1.66cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:4167: nahi vyutpattiviṣayasya parokṣatvamaparokṣatvaṃ ca vyutpatterdairbalye prābalye ca kāraṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4174: yat yasmāde(vaṃ)vaitat tasmāttattannāmāna evaita iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4181: dṛḍhayuktivirodhe tu sarvatra nyāya īdṛśaḥ // MAnuv_2,1.67ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:4194: tadyadi yuktyantarasyāpi syāttadā kuto na bādhakateti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4197: kintu sarvatrāpi vedavākye pramitavyāptipakṣadharmatāvadyaktivirodhe satīdṛśa evānyathārthasvīkāreṇa virodhaparihāro nyāyaḥ prakāro draṣṭavya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4207: asad iti cen na pratiṣedhamātratvāt | BBs_2,1.7 |
GSP33nysu__2u:4212: yatra yadā vedasya vākyayutā yuktirvirodhinī syāt,
GSP33nysu__2u:4214: vastunirṇayaḥ kathaṃ syāt iti pūrvapakṣiṇerite sati tadvirodhiyuktīnāṃ bāhulyāt prābalyāt vastunirṇayo bhavediti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4217_1: sati taddṛṣṭāntena brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvābhidhāyakasyāpi vedasya vedatvādaprāmāṇye
GSP33nysu__2u:4218: siddhāntastu yuktivadvedasyāpyapauruṣeyatvena dṛḍhatvāt vāstavavirodhasyānupapatteḥ aviruddhātharkalpanopapatteḥ nāprāmāṇyamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4220_0: iha punarvedavākyāntarasaṃvādena sudṛḍhayā yuktyā viruddhatvādbrahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvābhidhātrīṇāṃ
GSP33nysu__2u:4220_1: śrutīnāmeva tatra prāmāṇyānupapattau prathamādhyāyoktavastunirṇayo na bhavediti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4222: pūrvapakṣiṇotprekṣitābhyaḥ śrutisahitayuktibhyo 'pi prabalānāṃ tadvirodhiyuktīnāṃ sadbhāvāttadviruddhānāṃ pūrvapakṣaśrutiyuktīnāmaprāmāṇyādupapannataraḥ prāgukto 'rtha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4226: nanvevaṃ sati śrutīnāṃ śrutiyuktivirodhaparihāro 'syādhikaraṇasyārtha ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:4228: nātretyato 'sya tato 'pi vailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayitumuktamalpeti, bahuleti ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:4232: nanu śrutiyuktibhyāṃ pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ prabalayuktimātrāśrayeṇa siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4237: tathā pūrvapakṣāgamāpekṣayā virodhyāgamasya ca bāhulyaṃ kathaṃ nirṇayaṃ na kuryāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4238: pūrvapakṣyutprekṣitayuktyāgamābhyāṃ prabalau virodhiyuktyāgamau tadbādhayā vastuvyavasthāṃ kuruta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4240: na kevalaṃ siddhānte prabalayuktimātraṃ, kinnāma prabalāgamo 'pyastīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4244: tadidamudāharaṇaniṣṭhaṃ vyutpādayituṃ pūrvapakṣamanuvadati sūtrakāraḥ- asaditi cediti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4260: tpūrvabhāvī, sa tasya kāraṇam, yathā kuvindaḥ paṭasyeti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4264: nanvatra jagatprāgabhāvasya jagatkāraṇatvamātraṃ vā sādhyam, anyayogavyavacchedena vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4267: na hi“yo yadapekṣayā pūrvabhāvī, sa eva tatkāraṇaṃ, nānyaḥ'; iti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4274: īśvarādīnāṃ pralaye 'sattvasiddhau prāgabhāvasya kāraṇatvamātrasādhane 'pi tasyaiva kāraṇatvamiti siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:4286: tatkiṃ śabdānāmanyatra śaktireva nāsti, kiṃ vā śrutestatra tātparyābhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4291: tathāpi prāgabhāvasyaiva kāraṇatvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ca na kvāpyupalabdhamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:4306: iha prathamāṃ vṛttimabhipretya neti siddhāntāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe(vyākhyāti)- asaditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:4339: tena kvāpyadhyātmalakṣaṇe viṣaye, atra tvanyatreti bhedaḥ sūcito bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:4342: anyathā pūrvameva vyākhyānam, idaṃ tu tadupapādanāyopayogīti vijñāyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:4344: atha dvitīyāṃ vṛttimabhipretya“asaditi cenna'; ityetāvatsūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- asaditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:4345: asat kāryaṃ yathā dṛṣṭaṃ vastutvāt kāraṇaṃ tathā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4348: yathā pralaye 'sat pramitaṃ tathā vastutvādbhāvatvātkāraṇaṃ kāraṇatvena siddhāntināṅgīkṛtamīśvarādikamapi(miti)
GSP33nysu__2u:4352_1: prāgabhāvasya niyatapūrvabhāvitvena viśvakāraṇatvaṃ siddhayan kartṛtayaiva setsyatīti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4353: tadidaṃ pratyanumānaparāhatamityāśayavān pratiṣedhamātratvaditi sautraṃ hetuṃ vyākuvarn sādhyamadhyāharati- niṣedheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4357: vipratipanno 'bhāvo na kartā pratiṣedhamātratvāt niṣedhaikasvarūpatvāt sampratipannaghaṭābhāvavaditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:4360: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kulālādeḥ kartṛtvaniścaye tu abhāvasya tatkalpakābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4362: nanvastu niṣedhaikasvarūpatvaṃ, kartṛtvaṃ ca ko virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4363: tathāca ghaṭādyabhāvasyākartṛtve 'pi pralayakālīno 'bhāvaḥ kartā bhaviṣyatītyataḥ kartṛtvaniṣedhaikasvarūpatvayovirredhaṃ sphorayituṃ kartṛtvasvarūpamāha- buddhīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4367: vṛkṣeṇa sthīyata ityādau kartṛtvaṃ pāribhāṣikaṃ na tu svābhāvikamiti hi sarve 'pi pratipannāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4380: tato vyāpyaṃ kartṛtvamapi na sambhavatyeveti kathaṃ kartṛtvaniṣedhaikasvarūpatvayorna virodha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4386: abhāvaparyāyo hi pratiṣedhaśabdaḥ, kartṛtvaṃ ca kāryotpattyanukūlecchādiyoga ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4387: naca pratiṣedhatvaṃ kartari vartate, yenākartṛkaṃ vyabhicaret /
GSP33nysu__2u:4389: ataḥ pratiṣedhatvādityetāvatākartṛtvavyabhicārābhāvātsūtre mātragrahaṇaṃ vyākhyāne 'pyekagrahaṇaṃ vyarthamityata āha- pratiṣedheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4392: ataḥ pratiṣedhatvādityu(tyevo)kte kulālādau, akartṛtvena hetoḥ, vyabhicāraḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4396: nanu kulālāderbhāvasya kathaṃ pratiṣedhātmakatvamityata āha- abhāveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4402: asti khalu kulālāderbhāvasya bhedāparaparyāya(ḥ)pratiṣedhātmakaḥ anyonyābhāvo dharma iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4405: yaḥ kartā dharmī kulālādiḥ na tasya pratiṣedhātmakatvam,
GSP33nysu__2u:4406: yaśca pratiṣedhātmako 'nyonyābhāvo na tasya kartṛtvamittaya āha- dharmeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4415: astvevaṃ pratiṣedhatvasya kulālādau vyabhicārastathāpi kathaṃ mātragrahaṇasya sārthakyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4422: kulālādeḥ karturbhāvasya pratiṣedhatve 'pi(dhātmakatve 'pi)tanmātratā pratiṣedhamātratā na bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:4429: pakṣīkṛte abhāve prameyatvādidharmāḥ santi na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4434: anyathā pañcaiva bhāvāstadatirikto 'bhāva iti kalpanāyāṃ samavāyāderapi bhāvatvaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4437: tathāca yathā kulālādervipakṣasya vidhiniṣedhātmakatvena pratiṣedhamātratvābhāvastathā pakṣīkṛthābhāvasyāpi (dharmadvārā vidhirūpasya)
GSP33nysu__2u:4440: ghaṭābhāvasyāpi dharmadvārā vidhirūpasya pratiṣedhamātratvābhāvādityata āha- abhāvasya ceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4443: yadyapyabhāvasya pakṣīkṛtasya dṛṣṭāntīkṛtasya ca bhāvaḥ prameyatvādidharmo 'sti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4457: syādayaṃ svarūpāsiddhayādidoṣo yadyatra pratiṣedhamātraśabdena kevalapratiṣedhatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4473: icchāprayatnādirūpāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ kartṛtāparanāmikāyāḥ vyāpikā buddhiḥ abhāvādvayāvṛttā tāmapi vyāvartayatītyuktam /
