GSP33nysu__2u:9690: sarṣapāvayavaparamparāyā niravadhikatve mūrtānāṃ samānadeśatvānupapattau sarṣapāvayavairjagati vyāpte viśvavyāpī sarṣapaḥ syāditi mahīdharasyānavakāśa evetyāpādanārthaṃ iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:9692: sarṣapo yāvantaṃ deśamavaṣṭabhya vartamāno dṛśyate tāvatyevānavadhikāyā api tadavayavaparamparāyā avasthānācca /
GSP33nysu__2u:9696: tathāpyavayavaparamparāyā viśrāntyabhāve sambhūtāvayavānāṃ samasaṅkhayatvātparimāṇabhedo na syādi(tyucyata iti)ti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:9710: avayavasaṃyogo dravyāsamavāyikāraṇamiti vadanto 'pi vaiśeṣikādayaḥ paramāṇukāryotpattau dvayoreva sajātīyayoreva paramāṇvoreva saṃyoga(syāsamavāyikā)
GSP33nysu__2u:9715: kadācit trayāṇāṃ tattryaṇukaṃ caturbhiḥ paramāṇubhirārabdhaṃ ca(tacca)turuṇukam /
GSP33nysu__2u:9721: kuta iti cet uktaniyame pramāṇābhāvādityāha- dvayoreveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:9722: dvayoreva tu saṃyoga iti kenāvasīyate // MAnuv_2,2.82cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:9735: nanu sajātīyasaṃyoga evārambhaka iti niyamo na niṣpramāṇakaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:9742: kāraṇasya guṇāstena bhaveyuḥ kāryagā api // MAnuv_2,2.83ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:9747: yadi dvayoreva paramāṇvoḥ saṃyogaḥ kāryārambhaka iti niyamaḥ pramāṇavānsyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:9749: tathāca bahūnāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ vijātīyānāṃ saṃyogātakāryārambhe kāraṇagatā gandhādayo guṇāḥ (sadvitīyāḥ)
GSP33nysu__2u:9754: tatra vijātīyayorārambhakatve kārye gandhādyanutpattiḥ prasajyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:9761: vastutastu yataḥ kāraṇānyeva kāryākāreṇotpadyante tena kāraṇaguṇā eva kāryagā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:9775_1: santatotpattyādiprasaṅgāttryādikalpane gauravād dvayoreva paramāṇvoḥ saṃyogo dravyārambhaka
GSP33nysu__2u:9779_0: yataḥ kāraṇāttāratamyena sarve 'pyarthā mahāntaścāṇavaśca samathirtāḥ tataḥ parimāṇatāratamyavaditi
GSP33nysu__2u:9779_1: dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavikalatvāt dvayoreva tu saṃyoga itrata kenāvasīyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:9782: yatastāratamyena sarve 'pi mahāntaścāṇavaśca samarthitāḥ tena dvayaṇukamahattvāttadutpattyupapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:9796: sajātīyābhyāmeva dvābhyāmeva paramāṇubhyāmevetyādiniyamavatyāṃ tatproktasṛṣṭau tu mānaṃ nāsti tat sākṣyādisiddhasyāsmadabhimatasṛṣṭiprakārasya bādhakaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:9800: kathaṃ sākṣimitasyāsya śaknuyād vāraṇe kvacit // MAnuv_2,2.84b-d //
GSP33nysu__2u:9807: atra tatproktasṛṣṭāviti sāmānyato vadatānyadapi tatkalpitamaprāmāṇikamiti sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__2u:9809: ityetāṃ śrutyādiprasiddhāṃ prakriyāmapahāya vāyvādīnāṃ caturṇāmanyonyānapekṣaiva sṛṣṭirvyutkrameṇa cābhihitā /
GSP33nysu__2u:9819: sa ca dvitvasamavāyikāraṇe tantau samavetatvāt samavāyikāraṇapratyāsannaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:9825: tathāpi vyāpyabuddhervyāpakabuddhiṃ prati viṣayabuddherdharmādharmayośca sukhaduḥkhe pratyasamavāyikāraṇatvāpatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:9833: ato nātīvātra nirbandhaḥ karaṇīya iti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:9839: nanu paramāṇudvayaṇuke eva tāvanna sākṣisiddhe kutastadīyārambhaprakāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:9864: siddhatve pakṣalakṣaṇābhāvādasiddhatve nyāyāviṣayatvātparamāṇvādeḥ pakṣīkartumaśakyatvāt tatpakṣīkāreṇānumā dūranirasteti /
GSP33nysu__2u:9866: yatra nāsti padanyāsaḥ kastaṃ viṣayamāpnuyāt // MAnuv_2,2.86ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:9884: anumitaṃ dvayaṇukaṃ pakṣīkṛtya paramāṇuranumāsyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:9885: tadapi hi paramāṇuṃ pakṣīkṛtya yadi sādhyate tadokta eva doṣa ityāha- pakṣīkartumiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:9886: adyāpyasiddhasya paramāṇoḥ pakṣīkartumaśakyatvātkuta eva tatkāyardvayaṇukānumā bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:9899: yadidaṃ jālasūryamarīcisthaṃ sarvataḥ sūkṣmatamaṃ raja upalabhyate tattryaṇukamityucyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:9901: kāryaṃ ca mahattve sati cākṣuṣatvāt mahatve sati kriyāvatvādvā /
GSP33nysu__2u:9905: yaśca tadavayavaḥ sa eva paramāṇuḥ tadavayavakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvādbādhakasadbhāvācca /
GSP33nysu__2u:9907: pratyakṣasya tryaṇukasyaiva paramāṇutvasambhavena tatkāryatvasāvayavatvasādhānāya pakṣīkartumaśakyatvātkuta eva dvayaṇukaparamāṇvoranumā bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:9928: santu vā tadavayavāsta eva paramāṇava iti teṣāṃ punaravayavasādhanāya pakṣīkartumaśakyatvātkuta evānumā bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:9944: evaṃ paramāṇudvayaṇukayoranumānataḥ siddhimapākṛtya prasaṅgādākāśādiparimāṇotkarṣānantyasyānumānikatvaṃ na yujyata iti yaduktaṃ tatprapañcayati- deśāntareti //
GSP33nysu__2u:9948: sa svataḥ sthūlena deśāntareṇa yukto deśatvāddhastādideśavadityādyanumānaiḥ khalvākāśādiparimāṇotkarṣānantyaṃ sādhanīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:9952: anenaiva prakāreṇa śaśaśṛṅgādikamapyanumātuṃ śakyata iti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:9957: vimatāḥ sarve putrāḥ putrāntaropetāḥ putratvāddevadattaputravaditi śaśaśṛṅgādisādhakānumānābhāsasamānayogakṣemaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:9961: kintu vipratipanno deśaḥ svataḥ sthūlena sadṛśena sajātīyena vā dravyāntareṇa yukto deśatvāddhastādideśavat /
GSP33nysu__2u:9969: sadṛśaṃ ca sajātīyaṃ nāsmatpakṣe kimeva hi // MAnuv_2,2.87ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:9974: tathāca sampratipannadeśasya tataḥ sthūlenātmanā sadṛśena sajātīyena vopetatvasya siddhatvātsiddhasādhanatā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:9992: tatrāpi hi śakyate vaktuṃ yadi dhūmavattvātpavarto 'gnimāṃstadā paśutvācchaśo 'pi viṣāṇavānyasyāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:10021: vidyate ca dhūmādyanumānānāṃ pramāṇāvadhṛtaṃ vyāptyādīti na pratibandīgrahamātreṇa tadbhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10026: pratyakṣādyanavadhṛtavyāptyāderapi prāmāṇye 'tiprasaṅgo vā tadaprāmāṇye dṛṣṭānto vā pratibandīgraheṇa dyotyata ityadoṣa iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10030: dhūmasyāgnineva mahadārambhakatvādīnāmapi sāvayavatvādinā sāhityadarśanādityata āha- saheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10044: kathaṃ tarhi vyāptyadhyavasāyaḥ syādityata āha- yadaiveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10058: ataḥ sāhitya iva vyabhicārābhāve 'pi pramāṇapravṛttau vyāptisiddhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10066: kintu bhūyaḥsahacaritatayā dṛṣṭā adṛṣṭavyabhicārā api dharmā vyabhicāriṇo dṛṣṭāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10072: sahavṛttisvabhāvasyāpi nimittāntarādvayabhicāro bhaviṣyatīti tu nirbījā śaṅkāṃ nodetyeva /
GSP33nysu__2u:10074: tadevaṃ mīmāṃsāsahakṛtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ dhūmasyāgnisambandhaṃ gṛhṇadvayabhicārābhāvamapyākalayatīti vyāptimavadhārayatyeva /
GSP33nysu__2u:10077: nanvanenaiva nyāyena mahadārambhakatvādīnāmapi vyāptiniścayasambhavātkathaṃ paramāṇvādāvanumānāpravṛttiriti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:10082: aniṣṭāni ca sarvāṇi hyanumā kāmacāriṇī // MAnuv_2,2.90 //
GSP33nysu__2u:10099: pramite na gauravaṃ doṣa ityetadapi samānam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10100: tasmātparamāṇvādeḥ sākṣivedyatvamaṅgīkṛtya pratibandī mocanīyeti kathaṃ na tasya sākṣivedyatvamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10107: ityāgāmisūtravyākhyānenaiva vyākhyātaṃ bhaviṣyatīti manvānastadapahāya hetvantareṇa vaiśeṣikādisamayamapākurvan(t)
GSP33nysu__2u:10112: anena samavāyapratipādakaṃ pareṣāṃ“iheti yataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ sa samavāyaḥ';
GSP33nysu__2u:10120: bhinnasyaiva tu sambandhaḥ samavāyo 'nya īryate // MAnuv_2,2.91b-d //
GSP33nysu__2u:10124: nanu guṇaguṇyādikamabhinnaṃ bhinnābhinnaṃ vā tatkiṃ samavāyenetyata uktam- bhinnasyaiveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10127: sa guṇaguṇyādisvabhāva eva cenna padārthāntarasiddhirityata uktam- anya iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10136: iha paṭe rūpamiha mūrte karmeha gavi gotvamiha nityadravye viśeṣa ityabādhitaḥ pratyayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10142: tadevaṃ pramitasya samavāyasyābhyupagame kathamayuktavāditvaṃ vaiśeṣikādīnāmityata āha- bhinnatveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10143: bhinnatvasāmyatastasya tābhyāṃ yogo bhaved dhruvam // MAnuv_2,2.92ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:10151_0: iha tantuṣu paṭa ityādipratyayaḥ sambandhapūrvako 'bādhitehapratyayatvādiha kuṇḍe
GSP33nysu__2u:10151_1: badarāṇīti pratyayavaditi samavāyamanumimānena yo 'bādhitehapratyayaḥ sa sambandhapūrvaka
GSP33nysu__2u:10153: tena samavāyasyāpi tantupaṭābhyāṃ samavāyo 'bhyupagantavya eva syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10156: nanu tantupaṭayoḥ samavāyaḥ siddho na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:10160: āpātataḥ pratīte sambandhe vyabhicāraṃ dṛṣṭvā parāvṛtterāvaśyakatvasya vivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10167: iha tantupaṭayoḥ samavāya iti pratyayo 'pi sambandhapūrvaka eva tantupaṭasamavāyasyaitatkāraṇatvāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:10177: yata iti ca viṣayasaptamīṃ vyācakṣāṇāḥ tatsthemne anumānamācakṣate /
GSP33nysu__2u:10183: yadveha kuṇḍe badarāṇītivatsambandhasya pratītyaivehapratyayakāraṇatvādatrāpi pratītimāpādyānavasthaiva vaktavyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:10184: kuṇḍabadarasaṃyogasya yogyatayā avarjanīyatayā pratītirnehapratyayakāraṇamiti kuta eṣā kalpanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:10188: svasvāmibhāvādayo 'pi hi jñātā eva sambandhanimittavyavahārahetavo dṛṣṭā nānyathā /
GSP33nysu__2u:10193: nanvevaṃ tarhi nānaikāntyāt anavasthaiva bādhitatvenābādhitehapratyayatvasya tatrāvṛtteriti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:10201: kiñcaivaṃ vadatā sattayaiva sambandhasya kāraṇatvamiti mataṃ tyaktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10203: api cābādhito 'pīhapratyayo yadi sambandhāropamātreṇa bhavettadā tantupaṭādāvapi kinna bhavediti samavāyāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10206: anyathā samavāye 'pi samavāyāntarārope na syātsamavāyāntarasya kvāpya(sattvāt)sambhavāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10207: samavāye bheda evāropyate na samavāyāntaramiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:10216: sa evāvayavāvavyādiṣvātmanā sambandha ityāśaṅkate- sa iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10220: evaṃ tarhi kiṃ samavāyena, dravyasyaiva svanirvāhakatvopapatteriti pariharati- dravyameveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10232: samavāyaḥ sambandhātmakatvāt svanirvāhakaḥ, na dravyamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:10237: evaṃ dravyādguṇādīnāmatyantabhede 'pi na tatsambandhaḥ samavāyalakṣaṇo 'paraḥ siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:10239: idānīṃ guṇādīnāṃ dravyādatyantabhedābhāvācca na samavāyasiddhirityāśayavāṃstadatyantabhede paropanyastānhetūnapākartuṃ tāvadupodghātamāha- viśeṣa iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10261: bhedaṃ hi teṣāṃ samavāyena sambandho vaktavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10263: naca sambandho yuktaḥ, saṃyogasya guṇatvena dravyamātravṛtteḥ, samavāyasya cābhinnatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10276: tathāca yadyabhinne 'pi samavāye tadgatatvādiviśeṣo 'ṅgīkriyate tadā guṇakriyādikamapi dravyasvarūpameva sadviśeṣātmakaṃ bhavatu na tu tanmātram /
GSP33nysu__2u:10277: samavāyadharmāstaviśeṣāḥ, guṇādayastu na dravyaviśeṣā ityatra viśeṣahetvabhāvād iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10287: guṇaguṇyādeḥ atyantabhede siddhe hi tatsambandhaḥ samavāyaḥ siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:10289: tathāhi na tāvattatra pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ, gavāśvādivadanupalambhāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10303: tadā vyapadeśabhedādihetūnāṃ vyabhicārānyathāsiddhibhyāṃ ābhāsatvātkena hetunā dravyasya guṇakriyādirūpasya guṇakriyādisvarūpatvasya niṣedhaḥ (kariṣyate) kriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:10304: guṇaguṇyādyatyantabhedaḥ kena hetunā sādhayiṣyata iti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:10310: nanvaupacārikatvaṃ vā bhrāntimūlatvaṃ vā vyavahārāṇāmaṅgīkṛtya hetūnāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ śakyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10316: yadāpyabhedabodhāya rūpameva ghaṭa iti vā vijñānaṃ brahmeti vā vyavahriyate tadāpi na paryāyatāmupetya, tathānanubhavāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10321: kiṃ mātā vandhyetivatsākṣādvirodhaḥ, kiṃvā kṛtakaṃ nityamitivadvayāptyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:10325: yatrānekatvaṃ tatrāvaśyaṃ bheda iti vyāptau hi sa syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10334: nanvayaṃ nānāvyavahāranirvāhaheturviśeṣo yadi dravyātmaiva kathaṃ tarhi (taddravya)
GSP33nysu__2u:10338: vināpi bhedena tatpratinidhinā viśeṣaṇaiva viśeṣasya tadīyatopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10339: evaṃ tarhi tasyāpi viśeṣasya viśeṣatvasiddhaye viśeṣāntaramaṅgīkartavyamityanavasthetyata āha- viśeṣaśceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10340: viśeṣaśca viśeṣī saḥ svenaiva samavāyavat // MAnuv_2,2.95ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:10342: yathā samavāyaḥ svenaiva samavāyī, na sambandhāntareṇetyabhyupagamyānavasthā pareṇa parākriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:10343: tathā sa dravye 'nekavyavahāranirvāheturviśeṣaśca svenaiva viśeṣī na punarviśeṣāntareṇa /
GSP33nysu__2u:10347: yathā dravyaguṇakarmasu sadvayavahārahetuḥ sattā svenaiva satī svīkṛtā /
GSP33nysu__2u:10348: yathā ca nityadravyeṣvatyantavyāvṛttipratyaye heturantyo viśeṣaḥ svenaivātyantavyāvṛttastathaiveti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10355: tasya cānavasthānirāsāya svanirvāhakatvamiti pakṣadvaye samāne ko viśeṣo 'bhedapakṣe,
GSP33nysu__2u:10363: astu tarhi guṇaguṇyādibhede vyavahārādisakamapi ghaṭapaṭādavanaikāntikamiti samānam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10364: astu tarhi guṇaguṇyādibhede pramāṇābhāvo viśeṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:10377: tathāpi bhedapakṣe kalpanāgurutādoṣāt guṇaguṇyādīnāṃ padārthāntaratā nāṅgīkriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:10381: ekasmin sa viśeṣaścet kiṃ pūrvaṃ tasya vismṛtiḥ // MAnuv_2,2.96 //
GSP33nysu__2u:10384: ekasmin samavāye, saḥ vicitravyavahārahetuścedaṅgīkriyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10392: samavāye pratītaṃ tadgatatvādikaṃ tu na samavāyātiriktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10393: kintu svabhāvabhedāparanāmnā viśeṣeṇaiva tatra vyapadeśabhedādyutpattiriti ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:10394: tatrāntato 'pyaṅgīkatarvyena vyapadeśabhedādinirvāhakeṇa viśeṣeṇaiva dravye 'pi tannirvāho vaktavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10396: yadvā dravyavatsamavāye 'pi tadgatatvādīnāṃ bheda eva svīkāryaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10399: kvacidbhedasya kvacidviśeṣasyābhyupagame kathaṃ kalpanāgauravaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10400: tadabhāve vābhedavāde kathaṃ kalpanālāghavaṃ na bhavediti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10402: atra dvidhākalpanapradarśanārthenaiva pūrvārdhena samavāye viśeṣasyāṅgīkartavyatāpi samathirtā veditavyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:10405: naca teṣu samavāyadharmāṇāmantarbhāvaḥ sambhavatīti viśeṣā eva taira(te ')ṅgīkartavyā iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10407: na kevalaṃ sarvathāṅgīkāryeṇa viśeṣeṇaiva guṇaguṇyādivyapadeśabhedādyupapattau dravyabhedamaṅgīkṛtya samavāya(eva)
GSP33nysu__2u:10419: sambandhāpratītau śuklaḥ paṭa iti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītirna syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10420: daṇḍīkuṇḍalītyādau tasya tatpūrvakatvadarśanāditi cenna, samavāyo 'stītyādau vyabhicārāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10424: iha bhūtale ghaṭābhāva iti pratyaye vyabhicārācca /
GSP33nysu__2u:10430: etena jātyādigocaro viśiṣṭavyavahāraḥ sambandhiniyato bhāvamātraviṣayābādhitaviśiṣṭavyavahāratvātsaghaṭaṃ bhūtalamiti vyavahāravadityapāstam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10431: jñāto ghaṭaḥ, asti samavāyaḥ ityādau vyabhicārāt /

GSP33nysu__2u:11048: vimataṃ karma dravyārambhakānārambhakasaṃyogārambhakaṃ na bhavati karmatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11050_1: vyāptestantukarmaṇo gaganavibhāgajanakatve tantvantaravibhāgajanakatvaṃ na syāditi cennana /
GSP33nysu__2u:11051_1: vyāpterākāśadeśavibhāgājanakatve tantvantarādapi vibhāgajanakaṃ na syāditi pratiprasaṅgasambhavāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11053: kiñca tantorākāśavibhāgo yadi vibhāgajo na tu karmajastadā sakarmakasyevākarmakasyāpi kuto na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11060: evaṃ chalatvenānavasthāprasaṅgaṃ nirākṛtya prakārāntareṇa nirākaroti- aṃśa iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11065: āpādake 'rthe dṛṣṭe sati sā anavasthitiḥ kā na dūṣaṇamiti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:11067: yadyaṃśataḥ saṃyogaḥ syāttadānavasthā syāttataśca saṃyogābhāva evāpadyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:11069: tasmānnāṃśataḥ saṃyoga iti hi viparyaye paryavasānaṃ kartavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11074: atrāṃśataḥ saṃyoge na bhavatīti ko 'rtho yadyaṃśisaṃyogasyāṃśasaṃyogapūrvakatāniyamo nāstīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11085: kimaṃśabhedena bhāvābhāvau dṛśyete uta ghaṭa eveti sandehāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11090: ta eva santu tarhi saṃyogāvābhāvāśrayāḥ kimaṃ(śi)śavṛttitvena viruddhena aṅgīkṛtena /
GSP33nysu__2u:11094: yadyaṃśago na saṃyogaḥ kāryeṣu prathimā katham // MAnuv_2,2.110cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:11096: yadi kāraṇānāṃ saṃyogastadaṃśavṛttirna syāttadā tadārabdheṣu kāryeṣu kāraṇāpekṣayā parimāṇotkarṣo na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11102: praśithilatā ca saṃyogasya keṣucidaṃśeṣu vṛttiḥ keṣucidavṛttireva /
GSP33nysu__2u:11105: tataḥ saṃyogasyāṃśavṛttitvābhāve pracayo 'sau na bhavatīti kāraṇābhāvādutkṛṣṭaparimāṇotpādo na syāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:11108: prastute paramāṇau saṃyogasyāṃśavṛttitvābhāve nātiprasaṅga iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:11115: paramāṇuparimāṇādaṇodvaryaṇukasya mahattā parimāṇotkarṣo nāstīti vaco 'dbhutaṃ svavyāhataṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11116: ayamāḍhyo 'yaṃ paramāḍhya itivadaṇuparamāṇuśabdābhyāmeva parimāṇatāratamyāvagatestadabhāvavacanaṃ svavyāhataṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11122: tatkathaṃ paramāṇoḥ pracayābhāve dvayaṇuke parimāṇotkarṣānutpādāpādanamityata āha- aṇūnāmiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11124: paramāṇormahattvaṃ ca vinetyetad vacaḥ katham // MAnuv_2,2.111c-f //
GSP33nysu__2u:11126: dvayaṇukānāṃ parimāṇotkarṣāpekṣāṃ vinaiva saṃkhyāmātreṇa tryaṇuke sa parimāṇotkarṣo jāyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11127: tathā paramāṇormahattvaṃ parimāṇotkarṣaṃ vinā kevalasaṃkhyayā dvayaṇuke parimāṇotkarṣo jāyata ityetadvacaḥ kathaṃ ghaṭate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11130: atra parimāṇamātragrahaṇe kartavye prathimeti mahattvamiti coktirvisadṛśaparimāratvasyānapekṣāhetoḥ nirākaraṇaṃ smārayitumiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11132: aṃśāṃśinoratyantābhedo bhedābhedau ceti yaduktaṃ tadviśadayati- aṃśina iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11135: yathā gaganāderyāvadaṃśabhāvinoṃ'śinaḥ svāṃśairatyantābhedastathā paṭāderaṃśino 'pi sarvairaṃśaiḥ atyantābhedaḥ ekaikāṃśena tu bhidābhidā /
GSP33nysu__2u:11151: yathā hi guṇānāṃ dravyābhede('pi) na dravyaṃ nirguṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11153: tathā vyatiṣaktatantava eva paṭastathāpi na paṭābhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11155: sa ca tebhyo na bhidyate iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11161: kathaṃ caikaikatantunābhedaḥ ekaikatra paṭabuddhayabhāvādityata āha- sarveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11171: kintu vyatiṣaṅge sati yattantūnāṃ viśiṣṭaṃ rūpam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11190: evaṃca guṇānāṃ guṇinaikye saṃyogādyāśrayānekadravyābhedo vā saṃyogādibhedo vā'padyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:11192: tasya vyaktayabhede vyaktīnāmapyabhedaḥ sāmānyasya vā bhedaḥ prasajyetetyataḥ saṃyogavibhāgapṛthaktavānāṃ tāvadanekāśritatvaṃ nāstītyāha- saṃyogaśceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11193: saṃyogaśca vibhāgaśca bhedaścaiva pṛthak pṛthak // MAnuv_2,2.113ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:11203: tathātve caikaikasminneva saṃyuktādipratyayaprasaṅga ityata āha- anyonyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11219: anyonyapratiyogena hetunā saṃyogādikamubhayorapi pṛthak pṛthageva hi dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11221: paṭo ghaṭena saṃyukto ghaṭādvibhakto ghaṭādbhinna iti paṭadharmaḥ saṃyogādigharṭapratiyogikatayā pratīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11225: evaṃ ghaṭadharmaḥ saṃyogādiḥ paṭapratiyogitayopalabhyamāno na paṭadharmo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11230: yaddhi ghaṭātpaṭaḥ pṛthak paṭācca ghaṭaḥ pṛthagityanyonyapratiyogikatayā pratīyate tadekapṛthaktavaṃ pṛthak pṛthagevābhyupagamyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11231: yattu bhinnāvimau bhinnā ime iti pratīyate tadanekapṛthaktavamanekāśritameva pratiyogyanirūpyasyaikāśrita(śraya)
GSP33nysu__2u:11233: bhinnā iti tu bhedānāṃ samudāyo hi dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11236: ime bhinnā ityādipratītau bhedānāṃ samudāyo 'nekatvaṃ hi dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11240: yathā hi śuklā ime paṭā ityādipratītāvaneke paṭā anekāni ca tadviśeṣaṇāni śauklayānyavabhāsante /
GSP33nysu__2u:11241: tathā bhinnā ima ityādipratītāvapyaneke padārthā aneke ca bhedāḥ prakāśante ityabhyupagantavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11248: kimatrānekasya dharmitayāvabhāsaṃ pramāṇayasi, uta dharmasyaikatvāvabhāsam, utobhayāvabhāsam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11253: asyāmapi pratītāvito ghaṭādamuṣya paṭasyāmutaḥ paṭādamuṣya ghaṭasya bheda ityevaṃ dvidharmiko bhedo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11258: tena anumīyate 'syāṃ pratītāveka eva bhedo dvidharmiko dṛṣṭa iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11260: tatraikavacanaṃ yattad viprāṇāṃ bhojanaṃ yathā // MAnuv_2,2.115cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:11268: paṭasya ca yādṛśena tantusamudāyenātyantābhedo 'bhihitaḥ sa eka eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:11271: ekaikena tantunā sarvaiścabhede 'pi bhedasyāpi vidyamānatvānnānyonyābhedaprasaktiriti svayamevohyatāmiti noktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11296: sāmānyamapīti vaktavye brāhmaṇatvāderayāvaddravyabhāvitvenāpi tatra parihāraḥ sambhavatīti jñāpayituṃ naratvādikamityuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11302: tathā naratvādikamapi tattanniyatadharmatayaiveyate dṛśyate iti pratyakṣamuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11303: yadvā yo 'nekāśrito dharmo nāsāvekaikapratītau pratīyate, yathā dvitvādi /
GSP33nysu__2u:11329: tatra dharmatvahetovyarbhicāraḥ naca vācyaṃ sāmānyameva sādṛśyamataḥ pakṣe vyabhicāracodaneyamanupapanneti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11332: tatra yadi sādṛśyamaśvatvātparam tadā sarveṣāmapyaśvānāṃ rāsabhasādṛśyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11337: dravyaguṇāvayavakarmavṛttīni sāmānyādeva hi sādṛśyanāmanyabhyupagacchāmo 'to na jātisaṅkaradoṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:11340: tannirūpyaṃ ca sādṛśyamiti sphuṭo 'nayorbheda ityata āha- etādṛśaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11341: etādṛśaṃ ca sādṛśyaṃ padārtheṣu pṛthak pṛthak // MAnuv_2,2.117ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:11343: bhavatu sādṛśyaṃ sāmānyato bhinnaṃ tathāpi tatpadārtheṣu pṛthak pṛthageveti na tena dharmatvahetorvyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11351: ekasmin sa vinaṣṭe 'pi yato 'nyatraiva dṛśyate // MAnuv_2,2.117cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:11354: tathāpi sa naratvalakṣaṇo dharmo 'nyatra narāntare dṛśyata eva yato 'to 'pi naratvādikamityuktena sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11355: yadvā vinaṣṭaṃ vināśaḥ saha vinaṣṭena vartata iti savinaṣṭaṃ tasminvināśavatīti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:11356: athavā'śrayeṇa saha vinaṣṭaṃ savinaṣṭaṃ tasminniti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:11366: nacaitadasti tasya nityatvādityata āha- kuta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11369: naṣṭanarāśritasyāpi naratvasya punaḥ sattvaṃ na niṣpramāṇakaṃ pratyakṣasiddhatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11372: ata evānumānamapi bādhitaviṣayamityata āha- ekatva iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11383: evaṃ sāmānyādīnāṃ pratyāśrayaṃ bhede pratyakṣānumānānyuktavā śrutimapyāha- śrutirapīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11393: anyonyaṃ bhinnā dharmā yeṣāṃ te bhinnadharmāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11394: bhinnadharmā ityanenāśrayato 'pi bhedo 'bhihita iti śaṅkānirāsārthamuktam- svairiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11434: kāraṇaguṇebhya evotpadyante tata eva tadvadeveti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:11436: anyathā kāryadravyaṃ saṃyogavināśādeva vinaśyati kāryadravyatvāt dvayaṇukavadityādikamapi syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11451: sarveṣu gopiṇḍeṣu yadyanugatamekaṃ gotvasāmānyaṃ na syāt tadā tatra gośabdasaṅgatigrahaṇalakṣaṇā vyutpattirna syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11456: atha vinaivaikena nimittenopadeśādyabhāve 'pi gopiṇḍāntare gośabda(saṅgatiṃ)saṅketaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11459: anugatagotve tu gośabdavṛttinimittatayopadeśādināvagate nāyaṃ doṣaḥ prāduṣyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11462: nanu kathaṃ tarhi sāmānyarahiteṣu pṛthivyādiṣu bhūtamūrtādiśabdasaṅgatigrahaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11507: tatra yadopadeśato vyutpadyate tadāyaṃ gaurityupadeśavākyaṃ vyāptigrāhakatayopayujyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11510: ayaṃ gaurityasyāyametatsadṛśāḥ sarve 'pi gośabdavācya ityartho vaktrā abhipreyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11515: kintvayaṃ caitatsadṛśāśca sarve gośabdavācyā iti vyāptiparaṃ tadā saṅgatigrahaṇottarakālaṃ gāmānayetyukte gośabdātsarvagopratipattiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11516: abhīṣyagopratipattistu jāyate sā kathamiti taṭasthasya codyaṃ pariharati- tathāpīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11524: tarhi sannihitasarvagopratipattiḥ kuto na bhavati iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:11526: tathāpi yasya kasyacidekasya gopiṇḍasya pratipattiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11536: tādṛśo 'yaṃ ca tacchabda iti jñāpayati sphuṭam // MAnuv_2,2.123ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:11538: yato vācakatvaśaktiḥ śabdasya sādṛśyagā sādṛśyasambandhinī sādṛśya(sya) vyāpiketi yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:11540: atastāṃ śaktiṃ tattadviṣayatayā sādṛśyaṃ sphuṭaṃ jñāpayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11543: ayaṃ paridṛśyamāno yasmāttādṛśa upadeśakāle sannihitena piṇḍena sadṛśastasmāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11544: tacchabdaḥ sa śabdo yasya vācako 'sau tathoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11551: nahi sādṛśyaṃ śabdaśaktiviṣayatayā pravṛttinimittatayā vā abhyupagamyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11560: vyavahārādipūrvikāyāṃ tu vyutpattau bhūyovyavahārādidaśarne sādṛśyavyāpyatāvagamo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11561: tataścaitadvākyādināvagatavyāptirityanumīyate“ayaṃ gośabdavācyo bhavitumarhati tatsadṛśatvāt yastatsadṛśassa gośabdavācyastathā cāyaṃ tatsadṛśastasmādgośabdavācyaḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11568: naca sāsnādimattvameva liṅgamastu kiṃ sādṛśyeneti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11572: naca vācyaṃ gosādṛśyamaśve 'pyastīti tatrāpi gośabdavācyatānumānaprasaṅga iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11575: tarhi sādṛśyaviśeṣa eva liṅgaṃ yo lakṣaṇabhūta iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11579: antyaviśeṣe hi na kiñcidanugatamasti, nāpyanugatāśraya upādhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11586: yastu manyate anugatasāmanyenaiva vyutpattyādikaṃ nānyatheti tasya bādhakamāha- jātitaścediti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11589: yadyanugatajātinimittaiva sarvatra vyutpattiḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇādikaṃ ca syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11592: jātiṣu jātyabhāvena tatra vyutpattyādikaṃ na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11594: yadi vaiyātyātkaścidbrūyāt“asti jātiṣvapi jātitvaṃ nāma jātistadvaśāttatra savarmupapadyate'; iti,
GSP33nysu__2u:11599: yadi tatra jātiṣvapi jātitvaṃ nāma jātiraṅgīkriyate tadānavasthitiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11600: tathāhi gotvādijātiṣu jātiśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ yā jātitvaṃ nāma jātiḥ sā na tāvatsvarūpe vartate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11602: ataḥ svavyatiriktāsveva jātiṣu vartata iti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11603: tathāca svavyatiriktajātiṣu jātiśabdapravṛttāviyaṃ nimittaṃ syānna tu svarūpe 'pi /
GSP33nysu__2u:11604: atastasyāṃ tadvayatiriktāsu jātiṣvekasya jātiśabdasya pravṛttau nimittaṃ jātyantaramaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11610: na hyasmābhiḥ sādṛśyamiva bhavatā jātiḥ (jāti)śabdapravṛttau jñāpakatayopeyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11618: yathā jātivijñānaṃ jātitvābhāvena dūṣitaṃ tathaiva vyaktivijñānaṃ vyaktīnāṃ vyaktiśabdavācyatvavijñānaṃ tannimittavyaktitvajātyabhāvena dūṣitam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11623: mā bhūdvayatiriktaṃ vyaktitvaṃ sattaiva vyaktiśabdapravṛttau nimittaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:11628: nanu śabdamātrasya jātinimittatvātsattayā parāparabhāvaśūnyamapi dravyaguṇakarmasu vyaktitvamastyevetyato noktadoṣa ityata āha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11632: tarhi tasya vyaktitvasyāpi viśeṣeṣu vyaktiṣu praveśaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11635: yaḥ śabdo 'nekavācakaḥ sa sarvo jātinimittaka iti svīkṛtya dravyaguṇakarmasu vyaktitvaṃ nāma jātiryadyaṅgīkriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11636: tarhi tasyāmanyāsu ca jātiṣu jātiśabdapravṛttaye jātitvaṃ jātiraṅgīkartavyā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11638: tarhi sā vyaktitvajātirapi jātitvajātiṃ prati vyaktiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11639: naca sā svarūpe vartate tato dravyāditraye tasyāṃ ca vyaktiśabdapravṛttyarthamaparaṃ vyaktitvamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11640: tatra punarjātiśabdapravṛttaye jātitvamabhyupagantavyamiti sāpi tadāśrayatayā vyaktiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11649: yadyanugatasāmānyanibandhanaiva sarvatra vyutpattistadā sakalapadārthasvarūpaṃ svarūpaśabdavācyatayā kathaṃ jñāyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11652: nanu ca sarvasvarūpeṣvanugataṃ svarūpatvamaṅgīkriyate mayāto noktadoṣa ityata uktam“svarūpatvamapi yadyanugatamaṅgīkriyate tadā anavasthādidūṣitaṃ bhavati'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11654: sarveṣu svarūpeṣu yatsvarūpaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ svarūpatvaṃ nāma sāmānyamabhyupagamyate,
GSP33nysu__2u:11658: atastasminnanyeṣu ca svarūpeṣu svarūpaśabdapravṛttaye 'nyatsvarūpatvaṃ nāma sāmānyamaṅgīkāryam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11667: yāvadanugatasāmānyanibandhanaiva sarvatra vyutpattiriti pakṣaṃ parityajya sāmānyahīne 'pi vyutpattimaṅgīkuryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11674: astu vā jātiṣu jātitvaṃ nāma jātiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11686: samavāyādau svarūpameva sambandha ityato na kaściddoṣa ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharannanugatasamānyadūṣaṇamupasaṃharati- kalpaneti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11689: sarvatra vyāvṛttameva vācyaṃ śabdapravṛttau nimittaṃ ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:11690: vyutpattistu sādṛśyanibandhanetyekarūpakalpanena sarvasāmañjasye kvacidanugataṃ sāmānyaṃ nimittaṃ kvacidupādhiḥ kvacitsvarūpamevetyanekakalpane kalpanāgauravaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11695: evaṃ samavāyaṃ svarūpato nirākṛtyedānīṃ yatsamavāyasya sarvatraikatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca“tattvaṃ bhāvena'; iti sūtreṇoktam,
GSP33nysu__2u:11700: tadapi nirāgikīṣurādau tāvadekatvaṃ nirākartuṃ pīṭhamāracayati- aupādhiketi //
GSP33nysu__2u:11716: sa pācakayājakādiraupādhiko 'rthaḥ kiṃ pacanādyupādhipuruṣatatsambandhebhyo 'nanya utānya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11735: yadi caupādhikaviśiṣṭādyamatiriktaṃ syāt tadā pācakamānayetyukte puruṣādyānayanaṃ na kriyetetyādyupapattivirodhaḥ /

GSP33nysu__2u:13067: naca vācyaṃ samudāyo bhavadbhiraṅgī(kriya)kṛta eva ta(taśca)trākṣepasamādhānasāmyamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:13070: sthāyitānāṃ ca tatsambhavo na kṣaṇabhaṅgavāda iti vakṣyati /
GSP33nysu__2u:13072: uktamarthamākṣipya samādadhatsūtram oṃ itaretarapratyayatvāditi cennotpattimātranimittatvāt oṃ //
GSP33nysu__2u:13083: evaṃ tarhi sṛṣṭipralayavyavasthā na syāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:13084: yatastasya samudāyasya sadātanatve 'pi puṃsaḥ samudāyatvavedanaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:13087: samudāyasya sadātanatve tadvedanamapi kutaḥ kādācitkamityata uktam- tacceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13090: samudāyatvavedanasya sāmīpyahetukatā kuta ityata (uktaṃ) āha- anyonyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13113: naca viralānāṃ paramāṇūnāmindriyālambanaviralaparamāṇubhyastadālambanatayā tathātathā sannikṛṣṭāḥ paramāṇavo jāyante /
GSP33nysu__2u:13125: natu kāryaviśeṣeṣu vyāpṛtaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.178ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:13127: kāryasambhūtimātre vyāpṛtiryasya tattathoktaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāryasambhūtimātravyāpṛtiḥ yatastato neti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:13140: saṃyogirūpe grāhyagrāhakarūpe ye arthendriye tayoḥ kāryayoḥ kāraṇatā saṃyogirūpakāraṇatā /
GSP33nysu__2u:13146: syāt, visadṛśakāryajananasvabhāvaṃ vā, ubhayasvabhāvaṃ vā, anubhaya(janana)svabhāvaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:13148: tatra yatrādyaḥ kalpo 'ṅgīkriyate tadendriyānālambanebhyo viralaparamāṇubhyastathābhūtā eva paramāṇavo jāyeran /
GSP33nysu__2u:13173: astu tarhyubhayasvabhāvaṃ kāraṇamiti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:13176: ato 'niyatyā yatkiñcid yasya kasyāpi kāraṇam // MAnuv_2,2.180ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:13179: aniyatyā ghaṭo ghaṭasyaiva nīlonīlasyaiveti niyatiṃ vinā /
GSP33nysu__2u:13191: nanu ca kāryajananamātraṃ vastunaḥ svabhāva ityaṅgīkurmo na tūkteṣu kamapi pakṣamityata āha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13204: adṛṣṭādisahakārisamavadhānāt (tu) tatsadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā janayiṣyatītyata āha- adṛṣṭamapīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13219: tasyaiva kāraṇasya viśeṣāpādakaṃ kuta ityaparaṃ vākyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:13221: viśeṣāpavādakamapyadṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ vivakṣitasyaiva kāraṇasya viśeṣamāpādayati, kāraṇamātrasya vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:13229: ubhaya(trāpi dvi)tra dvitīyau kalpau dūṣayati- yasyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13233: yadi pūvarpūrvatarādyadṛṣṭasyāpyasti viśeṣāpādakatvaṃ tarhi tadapi pūvarpūrvatarādiparamāṇvādau viśeṣamāpādayedeva /
GSP33nysu__2u:13237: yadi kāraṇamātrasya viśeṣāpādakamadṛṣṭamaṅgīkriyate tadā sarveṣāmapi kāraṇānāṃ viśeṣamupapāditam /
GSP33nysu__2u:13246: tantavo yadi sadṛśakāryajananasvabhāvāstadā tantvantarameva janayeyurna tu paṭam /
GSP33nysu__2u:13247: yadi ca visadṛśakāryajananasvabhāvāstadā na tebhyaḥ pārthivapaṭasyotpattiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:13255: sa ca yathā yathopapadyate tathā tathā kalpayiṣyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:13257: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva yatkiñcid yasya kasyacit // MAnuv_2,2.181cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:13262: yatkiñcinnīlādikaṃ yasya kasyacideva pītādeḥ kāryaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:13263: yatkiñcitpītādikaṃ yasya kasyacideva nīlādeḥ kāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:13265: nīlā nīlasyaiva kāryaṃ syāt na pītasya /
GSP33nysu__2u:13266: nīlameva nīlasya kāraṇaṃ na pītami(tyatra)tiniyāmakābhāvāditi yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:13270: yadyatra samavetaṃ yadyenākāreṇa pariṇataṃ vā tattasya kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ceti niyāmakasadbhāvena kāyarkāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇe sati tadupapādakakalpanopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:13271: kṣaṇabhaṅgunaye tu pūrvottarakṣaṇayorniranvayavināśotpādayoḥ kāyarkāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇopāya eva nāsti /
GSP33nysu__2u:13275: samavāyapariṇāmayārabhāve 'pi yadyadapekṣayā pūrvabhāvi tadeva tasya kāraṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:13276: yacca yadapekṣayā paścādbhāvi tadeva tasya kāryamityavadhāraṇopapatterniyāmakābhāvo 'siddha ityataḥ kāryaniyamaṃ tāvannirākaroti- idamasyaiveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13279: iti nityavināśitve kena mānena gamyate // MAnuv_2,2.182b-d //
GSP33nysu__2u:13287: paścādbhāvamātrasya nī(lasyeva pītasyāpi)lāpekṣayeva pītāpekṣayāpi sattvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:13291: idaṃ na jāyate 'muṣmādityatrāpi na kāraṇam // MAnuv_2,2.183ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:13293: idaṃ nīlamamuṣmātpītānna jāyate kintu nīlādevetyatra nīlasya kāraṇatvāvadhāraṇe 'pi,
GSP33nysu__2u:13295: nīlasyeva pītasyapi nīlāpekṣayā pūrvabhāvitāyāḥ sattvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:13297: nanu yathā bhavatāṃ samavāyapariṇāmayorabhāve 'pi kuvindapaṭayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇaṃ tathā mamāpi bhaviṣyatītyata āha- idamasyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13306: evaṃ samudāyaṃ nirākṛtya sarvasya kṣaṇikatāmadhunā pramāṇābhāvena tadvirodhena cāpākartumuttaro granthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:13329: pratyakṣaṃ khalvarthānāṃ vatarmānakālasattāmavagāhate na punaḥ kṣaṇamātrabhāvināvutpattivināśāvapi /
GSP33nysu__2u:13333: nanu ca pratyakṣaṃ pūrvottarakṣaṇavatirtvamapyarthasya gṛhṇāti na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:13336: dvitīye tu pratyakṣānupalambhena parvottarakṣaṇayorasattvasiddheḥ kṣaṇikataiva si(dhyediti)ddheti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:13343: kasyācitpratyakṣasya vartamānamātragrāhitve 'pi tadevedamiti pratyabhijñānalakṣaṇasya tadabhāvādityāśayenāha- dṛśyata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13349: etena na kevalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kṣaṇikatāṃ na gocarayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:13351: tvamapi gocarayatītyapīti vadatā parapakṣe pramāṇavirodhaḥ svapakṣe pramāṇasadbhāvaścodito bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:13354: sarvavastuṣvityanena saugatānāṃ pratyabhijñānirākaraṇaṃ vaiśeṣikādimatameva spṛśati na tvasmanmatamiti sūcayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:13356: kimanayā pratyabhijñayā nityatvenābhyupagateṣu paramāṇvādiṣu sthiratvaṃ sādhyate kiṃvā ghaṭādiṣu /
GSP33nysu__2u:13361: yadā hi ghaṭādau sūcyagrādinaiko 'pi paramāṇurapaiti tadā naṣṭavyameva tadārabdhena dvayaṇukena /
GSP33nysu__2u:13364: naca paramāṇuḥ pratyakṣo yena tadapagamānapagamau pratyakṣeṇa śakyaniścayau /
GSP33nysu__2u:13365: naca vācyaṃ nibiḍāvayaveṣu sphaṭikādiṣu pratyabhijñayā sthiratvaṃ setsyatīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:13376: sattve 'pi rūpādisamānameveti śaṅkitaprāmāṇyaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ na kutrāpi sthairyasiddhau pramāṇayituṃ yuktamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:13382: na punaranyadeva bhavatīti hi pariṇāmavādino manyante ataḥ pratyakṣayogyeṣu sarvavastuṣu pratyabhijñayā sthiratvagrahaṇaṃ yuktameveti /
GSP33nysu__2u:13388: tadā sāvadhāraṇasya pratyabhijñānasya bhramatve 'pi tadidamiti tu na bhramaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:13390: yadā tu kālādidvayasambandho viṣayastadā sāvadhāraṇamapi na bhrama iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:13391: nanvidaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ parilūnapunarjātakuntalāpādāviva bhrāntaṃ kinna syāditi cet (na) /
GSP33nysu__2u:13398: ***[NOTE: jump in verse numbering, no lacuna in text!]***
GSP33nysu__2u:13405: tatastaddṛṣṭāntena sarvatra phalādivyatirikte 'pi vastuni sattvena hetunā pañcaskandhā ityanumānaṃ sthiratvaviṣayapratyabhijñāyā bādhakaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33nysu__2u:13422: taddṛṣṭāntenākhilasyāpi phalāderaviśeṣaḥ pūrvottarakālayoḥ parimāṇabhedābhāvaḥ sattvāt kiṃ nānumīyata iti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:13432: etena“ākāśe cāviśeṣāt'; iti sūtraṃ vyākhyātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:13443: sasvarūpatve 'pi vā sattve, abhāvo niḥsvarūpa ityaṅgīkṛtamityāśaṅkayāha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13444: yadyākāśasya sattvaṃ na kuta eva narādiṣu // MAnuv_2,2.187ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:13446: yadyākāśasya sattvaṃ nāstītyaṅgīkṛtya pratyanumāne 'tiprasaṅgānumāne ca dṛṣṭāntasya sādhanavaikalyaṃ svānumānasyānaikāntikatvābhāvaścocyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:13447: tadā dehādiṣu sattvaṃ kuta eva siddhamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:13449: yadi ca vidhimukhapratyayavedyatvāddehādīnāṃ bhāvatvaṃ pramāviṣayatvātsattvaṃ cocyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:13460: sa hi bhūtalādidharmiṇā ghaṭādipratiyoginā copeta eveti /
GSP33nysu__2u:13462: abhāvasya hi dharmipratiyogisāhityaniyamaḥ kiṃ deśataḥ syāt, kiṃvā kālataḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:13464: bhūtalasya svāśraye, abhāvasya tu bhūtale vṛtteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:13469: tau vinā na hy abhāvaś ca kvaciddṛṣṭaḥ kadācana // MAnuv_2,2.187*ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:13471: atra dṛṣṭa iti prakaraṇāttau vineti tajjñānaṃ vinetyatharḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:13476: abhāvaḥ pratīyamāno dharmipratiyogighaṭita evātredaṃ nāstītyādirūpeṇa pratīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:13480: kimato yadyevamabhāvasya yadyevamabhāvasya dharmipratiyogisāhityaṃ pratītau vyāpakamityata āha adharmīti
GSP33nysu__2u:13486: vastuto mūrtābhāvagocaraiva pratītiḥ pralayādivannañvarjitābhilāpasambandhādatādṛśīva prakāśata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:13493: kiñca mūrtābhāvamākāśaṃ vadatā yo dharmī tasyocyate sa evāsmākamākāśa iti nāmnayeva vivādo 'vaśiṣyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:13504: na hyunmattaḥ sarvatrāpramitaṃ svīkaroti nāpi pramitaṃ tyajatīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:13506: nanu (ca) yadi nīlādikaṃ na syāttadā sanna syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:13513: ādye kālāntarabhāvinīmarthakriyāṃ pratīdānīṃ samartho na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:13519: dvitīye tvādyakṣaṇa eva kartavyasya sarvasya kṛtatvāt dvitīyādikṣaṇe 'sattvamavarjanīyameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:13525: yadyātmānātmaprapañcaḥ sarvo 'pi kṣaṇikaḥ syāttadā pramāpramārūpaḥ sarvo(kalo)
GSP33nysu__2u:13528: tasya tajjātīyasya vā tena tajjātīyena vā saha bhūyaḥ sambandhāvagame (na)
GSP33nysu__2u:13534: atha yanmayā vyāptatvena jñātaṃ liṅgaṃ tadatra pakṣe 'stītyanusandhānam /
GSP33nysu__2u:13537: yena hi sakṛt dhūmo dṛṣṭo naṣṭa evāsau /
GSP33nysu__2u:13539: yasmiṃśca parvate dhūmo dṛṣṭo naṣṭa evāsau /
GSP33nysu__2u:13550: pratyabhijñānamapi yena pūrvāvastho 'rtho jñātastenaiva tasya vā tatsadṛśasya vā darśane bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:13557: pūrvottarakṣaṇavartināmātmanāṃ parvatādīnāṃ ca kāryakāraṇabhāvādupapanno 'numānādivyavahāra iti cet(na) /
GSP33nysu__2u:13571: na saṃskārārpakatvaṃ ca yujyate kasyacit kvacit // MAnuv_2,2.189 //
GSP33nysu__2u:13576: ato jñātaṃ mayetyādi na jñeyamanumā kutaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.190ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:13579: yanmayā vyāptatvena jñātaṃ tadatra vidyata ityādi yathā bhavati tathā na jñeyaṃ jñātumaśakyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:13583: tadbalenālaukikamapyasahabhāvinaḥ saṃskārārpakatvaṃ kalpayiṣyata ityata āha- ekatvamiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13602: tarkabalenānumāne niravakāśatayā prabale sati hi tadvirodhātpratyabhijñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:13603: yadā tu tarkasyoktavidhayā'bhāsatvaṃ, tadā kutaḥ kṣaṇikatvānumānaprābalyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:13610: nanvastūttarotpāda eva pūrvasya nirodhastathāpi kutaḥ pūrvasyottarasminsaṃskārānādhāyakatvamityata āha- kāryakāraṇayośceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13614: uttarotpāda eva pūrvasya nirodhātkāyarkāraṇayorekakālīnatvaṃ tāvannāstīti labhyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:13615: ekakālīnatvaṃ ca vinā pūrvāhitasaṃskārayogitvamuttarasya na yujyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:13616: niyamena cetyanena kvacidapi na yujyate kutaḥ sarvatreti sūcayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:13617: yadvaikakālīnasya eva saṃskārārpakatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na bhinnakālatva iti vyāpterityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:13618: nanvekakālīnatvābhāve 'pi kutaḥ saṃskārārpakatvaṃ na syādityata āha- sambaddhā eveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13620: asambaddhaḥ kathaṃ pūrva uttare vāsanākaraḥ // MAnuv_2,2.192 //
GSP33nysu__2u:13623: yasmāt akhilāḥ saṃskārādhāyakāścāmpakakusumādayaḥ padārthāstailādibhiḥ sambaddhā eva anyatra tailādau saṃskāramādadhate,
GSP33nysu__2u:13628: ekakālatayā yogaṃ vinā saṃskārataḥ katham // MAnuv_2,2.193ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:13631: yogaṃ vinā kāraṇasya kārye saṃskārārpakatvaṃ ca na ghaṭate,
GSP33nysu__2u:13633: saṃskārāparkatvaṃ ca na ghaṭate, saṃskārato vinā kathamanumānādivyavahāra ityadhyāhāreṇa yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:13634: yadīdaṃ saṅkalanaṃ na kriyeta tadā pūrvo(ktahetūnāṃ)
GSP33nysu__2u:13639: pūrvakṣaṇa uttarakṣaṇe saṃskārādhāyako na bhavati, tenāsambaddhatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:13640: yo yenāsambaddho nāsau tatra saṃskārādhāyakaḥ, yathā sampratipannaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:13641: yadvā yo yatra saṃskārādhāyakaḥ sa tatsambaddha eva dṛṣṭo yathā sammataḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:13642: asambaddhasyāpi saṃskārādhāyakatve mṛgamado vasanamiva sarvaṃ vāsayedaviśeṣāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:13653: atra ca parasiddhanyāyena parasya bodhanānnāśrayāsiddhayādi śaṅkanīyamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:13655: bhavedetadyadi kāraṇasya kāryotpāda eva vināśaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:13656: sa eva kutaḥ siddha ityata āha- kṣaṇamātramiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13661: tataḥ pūrvakṣaṇavarti kāraṇaṃ yadi kāyarkṣaṇe 'pi syāttadā sarvavastūnāmaṅgīkṛtaṃ kṣaṇamātramavasthānaṃ bhajyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:13662: ataḥ kṣaṇikatvābhyupagama evottarotpāde ca pūrvanirodhaṃ gamayatīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:13664: kāraṇaṃ kṣaṇasya pūrvavibhāge labdhasattākaṃ madhyavibhāge kāryamutpādyāparavibhāge tatra saṃskāramādhāya naśyatītyaṅgīkāre na ko 'pi doṣa ityata āha- pūrveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13671_0: evaṃ tarkasya pratitarkaparāhatimabhidhāyedānīṃ yathā sthāyinaḥ sattvānupapattirevaṃ
GSP33nysu__2u:13671_1: kṣaṇikasyāpi tadanupapatteranukūlatā nāma tarkadoṣa iti pratipādayituṃ sūtram oṃ
GSP33nysu__2u:13682: tathāhi kṣaṇikādbhāvādbhavatkāryaṃ kiṃ pūrvasya kāraṇasya bhāve bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:13684: uta tasya kāraṇasya nāśe sati sambhavatīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:13692: kāryaṃ ca tatsattāsamānakālīnasattaṃ cetkāryakāraṇayoḥ sahotpāda ityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:13693: kṣaṇe vibhāgābhāvasyoktatvāt tattatkāryāṇāmapyayameva nyāya iti tatsantānabhāvinā(pya)
GSP33nysu__2u:13698: “ubhayathā ca doṣāt'; iti sūtre kathitamiti vā(cā)tra noktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:13709: evamanyasyāpi kāryaṃ na bhavatīti na kāryaṃ syādakāraṇaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:13718: pakṣāntaraṃ vā grāhayiṣyatītyata āha- kāryotpattau ceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:13726: sacca vivādapadamiti pratikṣaṇaṃ kāryotpattau pramāṇamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:13729: nanu dehādeḥ pūrvottarakṣaṇayoḥ parimāṇabhedena bhedasiddhau kṣaṇikatvasiddhirityuktamityasya āha- abhede 'pīti //

GSP33nysu__2u:14392: ... pramā sā ca na bhavet svavirodhataḥ // MAnuv_2,2.221cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:14398: yasya viṣayo 'san(yat)svayaṃ ca bādhyaṃ, kathaṃ tatpramāṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:14399: ato 'sya viśeṣasyāprāmāṇikatvenāṅgīkartumaśakyatve yo 'nyo viśeṣaḥ prāmāṇikaḥ pramāṇāvirodhī cāṅgīkartavyaḥ,
GSP33nysu__2u:14404: tathocyamāne pramāṇānāṃ tattvāvedakatvamatharkriyāyāḥ sattvamasati tadabhāva ityādi bahu saṃvidheyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14417: tacca vyāpakamanabhyupagamapramāṇābhāvābhyāṃ jagato vyāvartamānaṃ svavyāpyaṃ bādhyatvamiti vyāvartayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:14421: satyatvapratyakṣasya pratikūlatvena ca parotprekṣitaṃ tarkamapi nirākartumāśaṅkate- bheda iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14429: yadi prapañco sāṃvṛto na syāttadā pratyakṣo 'pyasau na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14435: bhedo hi pratīyamāno ghaṭapaṭau bhinnāviti ghaṭapaṭayovirśeṣaṇatayā,
GSP33nysu__2u:14436: ghaṭapaṭayorbheda iti tābhyāṃ viśeṣyatayā vā pratyetavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14439: ghaṭātpaṭasya bheda iti vā ghaṭapratiyogitayā paṭadharmikatayā ca bhedagrahaṇameṣyavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14441: viśeṣyayorghaṭapaṭayorjñāne sati hi tadviśeṣaṇatayā bhedo jñātavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14442: nahi devadattādarśane daṇḍasya tadviśeṣaṇatayā darśanaṃ yujyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:14452: ato vāstavatve bhedasya pratītyanupapattau prapañcasyāpi tadāpatteravicāritaramaṇīyaḥ saṃvṛtibhaya evāyamaṅgīkaraṇīya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14461: yat yasmādbhedo vastunaḥ svarūpaṃ tasmāt tasya vastuno gra(he)haṇe sati paścādbhedagraha iti nāsti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14463: tathāca kvānyonyāśrayatvaṃ yena bhedo durgrahaḥ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:14466: yasmādvastuno grahe tasya bhedasyāgraho nāsti tasmādbhedo vastunaḥ svarūpamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14468: vimato bhedo ghaṭasvarūpaṃ bhavitumarhati ghaṭagrahe 'gṛhyamāṇatvarahitatvāt ghaṭasvarūpavadeveti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14469: yadi atra tasya grahe gṛhyamāṇatvādityevocyeta tadā ghaṭapaṭāviti ghaṭajñānena jñāyamānena paṭenānaikāntikatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14471: nahi ghaṭagrahe gṛhyamāṇo 'pi paṭo ghaṭagrahe sarvathā gṛhyata eveti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14472: yajjñāne yatsarvathopalabhyate tattatsvarūpamiti vyāptāvucyamānāyāṃ daṇḍijñāne daṇḍo 'pyavaśyaṃ sphuratyeva /
GSP33nysu__2u:14475: kiñca viśiṣṭaṃ nāma viśeṣaṇasambandhanimitto viśeṣyasyākārabheda iti pī na viśiṣṭapratyaye viśeṣaṇasphuraṇamasti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14478: yadvā ghaṭabhedau pakṣīkṛtya niyamenānyatarapratītāvanyatarasya sphuraṇenānyonyābhinnatvaṃ sādhyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14479: nahi daṇḍipratītau daṇḍa(sya)sphuraṇe 'pi, daṇḍapratītau sarvathā daṇḍi(naḥ)sphuraṇamastīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14487: anyathāsyāmunā bheda iti vaktuṃ na yujyate // MAnuv_2,2.223cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:14489: yadi bhedo vastupratītau na pratīyeta tadāsyāmunā bheda ityuttarakālaṃ savikalpaka(vi)
GSP33nysu__2u:14500: na kevalaṃ vastudarśane bhedasphuraṇamanabhyupagacchato 'syāmunā bheda iti paścātkālīnaṃ savikalpakajñānaṃ tathā vyavahāraśca nopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:14506: nantaraṃ smaryamāṇaro gṛhyamāṇo vā pratiyogī paṭo 'pi vinā bhedenopalabdhavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14508: tathā cottarakālaṃ svasmātsvayaṃ bhinna iti savikalpako bhedagrahaḥ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:14513: paṭādghaṭo bhinna ityeva hi savikalpikā pratītiranubhūyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:14515: ataḥ pratītivirodhādevaṃvidhaḥ savikalpakagraho nāṅgīkartumucita iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14516: kiñca yadi svasvātsvayaṃ bhinna iti savikalpako bhedagrahaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14526: kadāpi kasyacidapi tathā vyavahārābhāvena viparītavyavahāreṇa ca sarvapratītisiddheriti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14530: tatra kiṃ bhedo dharmiṇaḥ svarūpam, uta pratiyogino 'pi /
GSP33nysu__2u:14540: tatra dhamirṇo bhedena pratipannasya vā pratiyogitā, anyathā vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:14543: ādye pratiyogisvarūpabhedapratītau dharmiṇaḥ pratiyogitāyāṃ sa eva nyāyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14546: vastuto 'nyonyapratiyogikayorghaṭapaṭasvarūpabhedayoḥ pratītayoḥ satorasati sādṛśyādau pratibandhake 'nyonyapratiyogikatayā viśiṣṭabhedapratītau bādhakābhāvāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:14548: evaṃ svamatena bhedapratītāvanyonyāśrayatvaṃ parihṛtya bhinnabhedavādināṃ parihāramāha- dharmitveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14550: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca tadbhāvaścaiva gṛhyate // MAnuv_2,2.225 //
GSP33nysu__2u:14569: nanu yatra pratiyogī paścātpratīyate tatra yugapadavabhāso nāstīti taddṛṣṭāntena sarvatrāpyevamanumīyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:14584: ekasyāmeva nirvikalpikāyāṃ saṃvidi bhedasya bhedinośca yugapadavabhāsane sati tatraikaṃ bhedinamava(dhiṃ kṛtvai)
GSP33nysu__2u:14593: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena grahaṇamapi na dharmipratiyogiprakārādbhidyata iti vaiśeṣikaparīkṣāyāmuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14601: kimatra yadi dharmyādipratītyapekṣayā bhedaḥ pratīyeta tadānyonyāśrayatvaṃ syādi(tyā)
GSP33nysu__2u:14602: tyevāpādyate, kiṃvā yadi bhedaḥ pratīyeta tadānyonyāśrayatvaṃ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:14604: ... bhedaḥ kathaṃ grāhya iti yaḥ paripṛcchati /
GSP33nysu__2u:14616: bhedo durgraha iti pratijñāya tadupapattaye hīdamucyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:14617: anena ca yadi bhedo dharmyādipratītimapekṣya pratīyeta tadānyonyāśrayatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14618: tathāca na pratīyetetyāpādanena pratīyate cāto na dharmyādigrahaṇāpekṣā tatpratītiriti labdhaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:14619: tathāca“bhedo durgrahaḥ'“pratīyate ca'; ityetayoḥ kathaṃ na pūrvottaravirodha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14622: kiṃ pareṇa kvāpi bhedo na gṛhītaḥ kiṃvā kvacidgṛhīta iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14626: yadyanyatvaṃ kvāpi na gṛhītaṃ tadānyonyāśrayatvāpādanameva na śakyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14631: anyatvaṃ yadi siddhaṃ syāt kathamanyonyasaṃśrayaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.228cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:14637: asti bhedapratītiḥ sā na prameti tu tātparyamiti cenna kimanyonyāśrayatvamanyonyotpādaṃ pratibadhanātīti mataṃ, kiṃvā taddharmam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14642: tatkiṃ paṭa; sāṃvṛta iti yebhyastantubhyo jātasteṣāmeva kāraṇaṃ bha(va)viṣyatīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14644: nanvanenāsya tarkasya kiṃ dūṣaṇamuktaṃ syādityata āha- etādṛśasyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14648: na kevalametajjātyuttaraṃ kintu yadanyadapi tadīyaṃ vacanam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14654: tathā na tāvatpratyakṣeṇa bheda eva dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:14663: tathā sattāvatkāraṇaṃ vā kāraṇe sattā vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:14673: śūnyavādinirāse(naiva)na māyāvādo 'pi nirasto veditavya ityatideśajñāpanāya māyī cetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14676: nanvetadanyonyāśrayatvādikaṃ sūtrakṛtaiva kuto na nirākṛtamityata āha- taditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:14682: sadalameva pūrvapakṣivacanaṃ nirākartavyaṃ bhavati na nirdalam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14691: yacchūnyavādinaḥ śūnyaṃ tadeva brahma māyinaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.230ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:14701: nanu nirviśeṣatvena bāhyalakṣaṇabhedābhāve 'pi satyajñānānantānandātmakatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ māyāvādināṅgīkṛtam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14716: yatpunaruktaṃ dṛśyatvasya satyatve tatraiva vyabhicāraprasaṅgāttasya mithyātvaṃ vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14727: aprayatnāt prayatnamavidhāya,“vaidharmyācca na svapnādivat'; ityanena nirācakra iti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14731: ata e(vai)tadviṣaye sadvādinaḥ kimapi kṛtyaṃ nāstyeva /
GSP33nysu__2u:14737: yacca“mithyātve mā na kācana'; iti niṣpramāṇatvaṃ, tadubhayaṃ sūtre na dṛśyata ityata āha- ceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14742: nanvanuktasamuccayārthena caśabdenedaṃ dūṣaṇadvayaṃ sūcitamiti yathā vyākhyāyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:14754: bahusthaleṣu gṛhīteyaṃ vyāptirityato na vyabhicāramarhatīti pūrvapakṣiṇo 'bhimānaṃ sūcayituṃ sūtrakāreṇādipadaṃ prayuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14755: tathāpi prayogavelāyāmeka eva dṛṣṭānta upādeyo 'nyathā'dhikyaṃ prasa(jyate)jyeteti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14770: vijñānameva tattvaṃ, na rūpādayaścatvāraḥ skandhāḥ, iti yogācārā manyanta ityatharḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14773: nanu jñeyamapi rūpādikaṃ pratyakṣādisiddhaṃ tatkathaṃ vijñānameva tattvamityata āha- akhileti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14776: kuto jñeyasya jñānātmakatvamityata āha- prabhāsata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14778: tena prakāśamānatvasya jñānatvena vyāptau siddhāyāṃ nīlāderapi prakāśamānasya jñānatvaṃ siddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14785: vijñānasantatīnāṃ bhedasya ekaikasyāpi santatau vijñānabhedasya ca vidyamānatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14788: tenaiva vijñānasya sadvitīyatvāprāpternaikatvamupapadyata ityata āha- tatreti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14789: tatra santatibhedaśca svabhedo bheda eva ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:14811: kiṃ jñeyaṃ svarūpeṇāsadeva vijñāne samāropitaṃ vijñānātmaka(mityu)
GSP33nysu__2u:14812: mucyate, kiṃ vā paramārthasata eva jñeyasya jagato vijñānātmakatvaṃ bhedamātraṃ tvasaditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:14840: anumānavirodhaṃ cānumānasya pratipādayituṃ sūtram oṃ kṣaṇikatvācca oṃ //
GSP33nysu__2u:14852: atra kṣaṇikatvākṣaṇikatvalakṣaṇaviruddhadharmādhyāsaṃ bhedahetuṃ vadatā'ntarabāhyatvādiraneko viruddhadharmasaṃsarga upalakṣito boddhavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14854: evaṃ pratyekaṃ nirākṛtāni bauddhamatāni sādhāraṇadoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ sūtram- oṃ savarthānupapatteśca oṃ //
GSP33nysu__2u:14894: te ca jīvāstikāyo dharmāstikāyo 'dharmāstikāyaḥ pudgalāstikāya ākāśāstikāya iti pañca /
GSP33nysu__2u:14895: atra ca mokṣopayoginaḥ sapta padārthā jīvājīvāsravabandhanirjarasaṃvaramokṣāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14915: tatra sadavaktavyaṃ ceti pañcamaḥ, asadavaktavyaṃ ceti ṣaṣṭhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14919: atra saptabhaṅgitvanirāsārthaṃ naikasminnasambhavāditi sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- naitaditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:14920: naitat padārtha ekasmin yuktaṃ dṛṣṭivirodhataḥ // MAnuv_2,2.237ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:14932: nanvekāntadarśanasya mithyādṛṣṭitvena na tadvirodho 'sambhavamāhavatītyata āha- bhāveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14934: tadrūpameva taditi niyamaḥ kena vāryate // MAnuv_2,2.237c-f //
GSP33nysu__2u:14938: yadvā bhāvābhāvatayānyena ca yena sattvādi(nā)rūpeṇeti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:14939: athavā yena bhāvābhāvatayā rūpeṇeti sāmānādhikaraṇyena yojyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14944: yadi dṛṣṭasya niyamasya nivārakamanekāntasādhakaṃ prabalapramāṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14946: naca bādhakena vinā pratyayānāṃ mithyātvaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktamatiprasaṅgāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:14951: sadvādino hi sattvaṃ viśvasya pramāṇaiḥ prātiṣṭhipastadanaṅgīkāre doṣāṃśca nyarūpayan /
GSP33nysu__2u:14953: tathānye 'pi svapakṣasādhanaṃ tadanabhyupagame bādhanaṃ ca kṛtavantaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14955: tvaṃ nāṅgīkriyate tadā tu tadupanyastaṃ pramāṇamuparudhyeta dūṣaṇaṃ cānuṣajyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:14957: atastaddoṣaparihārārthaṃ tattatpramāṇānusaraṇārthaṃ ca tattadātmatā viśvasya mayā svīkṛtā /
GSP33nysu__2u:14970: sadvādino hi na kevalaṃ sattve pramāṇaṃ tadanaṅgīkāre ca dūṣaṇaṃ ca vyutpādya nivṛttāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14972: evamasadvādino 'pi nāsattve pramāṇaṃ tadanabhyupagame bādhakaṃ cābhidhāyaivoparatā,
GSP33nysu__2u:14975: tathāca sakalapakṣakakṣīkāre (tu) tattadvādyuktapakṣāntaradoṣalepaḥ kathaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14983: tathā cāṅgīkāraparityāgābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣṭo 'yaṃ kaṣṭāṃ daśāmāviṣyaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14987: akramānekānte 'pi yena rūpeṇa nityatvaṃ tenaivānityatvamityādyanaṅgīkārānna virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14988: tathāca saptabhaṅgayaṅgīkāriṇā mayā tāni pramāṇāni dūṣaṇāni ca vyavasthāpitāni bhavantīti noktadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14991: na khalu tatta(tpramāṇavā)dvādibhistāni tāni pramāṇādīni sāvakāśānyupanyastāni /
GSP33nysu__2u:14998: kiñca sarvāṅgīkārapakṣe syādasti ca nāsti ceti pakṣātsyādasti syānnāstīti pakṣadvayaṃ na bhidyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:15007: aśeṣamāviruddhaṃ ca nirmānaṃ vyāhataṃ sadā // MAnuv_2,2.239 //
GSP33nysu__2u:15009: svavyāhatatvamityādyā doṣāḥ sarve bhavanti hi // MAnuv_2,2.240 //
GSP33nysu__2u:15011: aśeṣamāviruddhaṃ vadata ityasyopapādanaṃ vyavasthitayā sadasattayā pramāṇāptaniyamamatihāyeti /
GSP33nysu__2u:15015: akramānekānte 'pi rūpabhedenetyata uktam- sadā sarvaprakāraṃ vadata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:15019: yadi krameṇa vā rūpabhedena vāneprakāratvam tadā nāyamanekāntavādaḥ samarthanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15021: nahi ko 'pi vādī padārthānāṃ kālato rūpataścāvasthāvaicitryamanaṅgīkurvāṇo 'sti /
GSP33nysu__2u:15024: ataḥ anekāntavādamavatārayatā kṣapaṇakena sadā rūpābhedenaiva ca sarvaprakāra(ka)
GSP33nysu__2u:15028: aśeṣamāviruddhaṃ sadā sarvaprakāratvaṃ vadato dṛṣṭahāniḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:15029: nirmāna ca sadā sarvaprakāraṃ vadato amagraho aprāmāṇikasvīkāraḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:15030: vyāhataṃ sadā sarvaprakāraṃ vadataḥ svavyāhatatvaṃ syāditi yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:15034: yadi pramāṇaviruddhamapi sarvaprakāratvaṃ viśvasya svīkriyate tadā dahanaśaityaṃ vā gavālambhanāderdharmasādhanatvādikaṃ vā(cā)'ṅgīkāryaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:15038: yadi cāprāmāṇikamapi sarvaprakāratvamurarīkriyate tadā kharaviṣāṇādikaṃ vā gomāṃsādibhakṣaṇasya dharmasādhanatvaṃ corarīkaraṇīyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:15042: yadi ca vyāhatamapi sarvaprakāratvamaṅgīkuryāt tadā māturapi vandhyatvaṃ,
GSP33nysu__2u:15052: evaṃ viśvasya kṣapaṇakoktaṃ sarvaprakāratvaṃ nirākṛtya taduktamarthāntaramapi nirākartumanuvadati- vaktīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:15057: svaprabhaṃ svaprakāśaṃ, dehasya mānaṃ parimāṇamiva mānaṃ yasyāsau tathoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15066: devadattātmā, taddeha eva, tatra sarvatraiva ca vidyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:15072: yathā devadattagṛha eva tatra sarvatraiva copalabhyamānasvāsādhāraṇabhāsvaratvādiguṇaḥ pradīpaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15076: yadvā pradīpasyeva svānapāyinī prabhā yasyāsau svaprabha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:15083: na ca paryāyād apy avirodho vikārādibhyaḥ | BBs_2,2.35 |
GSP33nysu__2u:15090: gajādidehagatasya ca tatparimāṇasya pipīlikādidehe 'tirekaḥ syādityubhayathā kāyaparimāṇatvānupapattireveti /
GSP33nysu__2u:15095: yaṃ yaṃ dehaṃ prāpnotyātmā tattatparimāṇo bhavatyato noktadoṣa ityāśaṅkānirāsārthaṃ sūtram oṃ naca paryāyādapyavirodho vikārādibhyaḥ oṃ //
GSP33nysu__2u:15102: astvātmana evānyathābhāvāstataḥ ko doṣa ityata āha- anyatheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:15112: yata evaṃ vyāptiryataścānyathābhāvitvamaṅgīkṛtaṃ tat tasmādātmano 'nityatvamāpatatīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15125: yathā dehasya dehākāranāmaparityāgena bhasmībhāvalakṣaṇānityatvaṃ tathāvidhamātamno 'pyāpādyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:15126: nanu anyathābhāvasyaivaṃ vidhānityatvena vyāptirnāsti paramāṇvādau vyabhicārāt /

GSP33nysu__2u:18459: ato bhedābhedaśrutyanyathānupapattyā jīvo brahmāṃ(ṇoṃ)śo 'ṅgīkārya ityeva sūtrārtha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:18460: etadarthaṃ ca na kenacidityādyekavākyatayā vā yojyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:18465: paramātmāṃśatvaṃ cedupagataṃ kathaṃ tarhi na bhedābhedāṅgīkāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:18476: tathāpi mukhyāṃśasādṛśyaṃ tatsattayaiva sattāvattvalakṣaṇameva jīvasyāṃśatvaṃ gauṇo 'yamaṃśaśabda iti iti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:18477: aṃśaśabdasyānekārthatvaṃ tatra matsyādyāḥ svarūpāṃśā eva jīvāḥ bhinnāṃśā evetyatra asambhāvanānirāsāya(dīnāṃ svarūpāṃśatvaṃ jīvānāṃ tvatathābhūtāṃśatvamityetatkuta ityato 'tra)
GSP33nysu__2u:18480: aṃśastu dvividho jñeyaḥ svarūpāṃśo 'nya eva ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:18482: aṃśino yattu sāmarthyaṃ yat svarūpaṃ yathā sthitiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:18483: sa eva cet svarūpāṃśaḥ prādurbhāvā hareryathā // MAnuv_2,3.79 //
GSP33nysu__2u:18490: sa eva cet tatsāmarthyādiyuktaścedaṃśastadāsau tatsvarūpāṃśo jñātavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:18493: anena prakāśādivannaivaṃ para ityasya tātparyamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:18495_0: matsyādīnāṃ jīvānāṃ ca parameśvarāṃśatvāsāmye 'pi naikaprakāratā kintu matsyādyāḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:18495_1: svarūpāṃśā eva jīvā vibhinnāṃśā evetyatrāsambhāvanānirāsāya prakāśavaditi sūtrakṛtā dṛṣṭāntā dattāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:18496: te cāyuktā iva pratīyante ubhayatra bhedābhedasāmyā(sadbhāvā)
GSP33nysu__2u:18501: sūryo 'tha saptamābdheśca bāhyodasya ca vāripaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.80 //
GSP33nysu__2u:18512: meruhimavadādeḥ puruṣā abhimāninaḥ purāṇeṣu (pra)siddhā ityata uktam- kaṭhiṇatveneti //
GSP33nysu__2u:18513: yatkaṭhinaṃ(ṇaṃ) sā pṛthivīti śruterdharādevyeva sarvasyāḥ pṛthivyā abhimāninī /
GSP33nysu__2u:18527: apabhraṣṭanāmakā devatā aṃśarūpāḥ sūryādibhyaḥ sūryavaruṇapṛthivībhyoṃ'śibhyo vyutkrameṇa yathā pṛthak /
GSP33nysu__2u:18528: jīvāṃśānāmaṃśinaḥ parameśvarātpṛthaktvaṃ yuktitaḥ samarthayituṃ sūtram anujñāparihārau dehasambandhājjyotirādivaditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:18532: anyāḥ sūryādidevebhyo hyanugrāhyāśca taiḥ sadā // MAnuv_2,3.83 //
GSP33nysu__2u:18533: evameva parād viṣṇoḥ pṛthak saṃsāriṇo matāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:18543: nanvanujñādihetutrayaṃ svarūpāṃśeṣu matsyādiṣvastītyanaikāntikaṃ na jīvāṃśānāṃ parameśvarādbhedaṃ sādhayitumalamityata āha- natviti //
GSP33nysu__2u:18558: tadarthaṃ vā natu matsyādirūpāṇāmiti vākyaṃ yojyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:18563: mukhyāṃśatvaṃ ceddhetustadāsiddhiriti pratipādayadābhāsa eva ceti sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- aṃśeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:18565: aṃśābhāsāśca sarve 'pi parasyāṃśā na mukhyataḥ // MAnuv_2,3.86ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:18572: nanvetat śrutiviruddhaṃ“pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi';
GSP33nysu__2u:18574: na tu pumpādavat pādā jīvā ete parātmanaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:18586: tatra kīdṛśo 'tra nirṇayo jāta ityatastaṃ buddhayārohāya piṇḍīkṛtyāha- akṣaya iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:18587: akṣayo bhagavān viṣṇurlakṣmyāvāso laye sthitaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.88ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:18593: devyā api pralaye 'vasthānoktyā viyatpa(denopa)dopalakṣitāyāstasyā na jīvavajjananamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:18594: viyadādipadopādānena tadabhimānitvadaśāyāmeva brahmādīnāṃ dehādyutpattirna muktāviti sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__2u:18599: layakramasamarthanena sūcitaṃ tāratamyaṃ tu tatrāpi nāpaitītyāśayenoktam- tāratamyagauriti //
GSP33nysu__2u:18600: viparyayeṇa tu kramo 'tra iti sṛṣṭikramaviparyayeṇa (pra)laye kramo 'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:18601: tatra kaḥ sṛṣṭau krama ityatastaṃ darśayanviyadadhikaraṇatātparyamāha- prakṛtiriti //
GSP33nysu__2u:18607: tato jātaḥ pumān nāma brahmāsyāṃ vāsudevataḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:18608: sūtrātmā prāṇanāmā ca devyau prakṛtimāninī // MAnuv_2,3.90 //
GSP33nysu__2u:18609: tato rūpaṃ mahān nāma brahmaṇo 'haṅkṛtiḥ śivaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:18611: skandaśca tata evānye sarve devāḥ prajajñire // MAnuv_2,3.91 //
GSP33nysu__2u:18614: tataḥ kaḥ sṛṣṭau krama ityatastaṃ darśayanviyadadhikaraṇatātparyamāha- prakṛtiriti //
GSP33nysu__2u:18625: tatra pūrvatanaḥ śreyān guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samastaśaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.92ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:18663: yadyapi caturthapāde 'pi śrutivacanānāṃ parasparavirodha eva parihriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:18672: tathāpyarthanirṇayāyaiva pādārambho na prāmāṇyanirṇayāyāto na mīmāṃsātvahaniriti darśayitumartha ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:18673: yadyapi yuktayaḥ pūrvapāde 'pi santi tathāpyāgamagṛhītavyāptyādimattvenātra prabalā iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:18674: pāramārthike virodhe niṇaryo duṣkara ityata ivetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:18680: yuktisahitaśrutibhiḥ pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ śrutimātreṇa tadviparītārthanirṇaya ityata uktam- suviśiṣyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:18682: tathā prāṇā ityādīnāṃ sūtrāṇāṃ bhāṣya evārtho vispaṣṭa ityataḥ pūrvottarapa(kṣīyayu)
